programme.title: Creative Parenting Hacks: Budget-Friendly And Luxury DIY Ideas
programme.desc: Discover brilliant crafting solutions for every family - from dollar-store transformations to premium material projects. These adaptable ideas work for any budget while keeping kids engaged with sensory fidgets and imaginative play.

programme.title: Smart Parenting Hacks And Practical Tips
programme.desc: Discover clever solutions to everyday parenting challenges, from mealtime tricks to organization shortcuts. These easy-to-implement ideas help make family life smoother and more enjoyable.

programme.title: The Ultimate DIY Guide: From Crafts to Self-Care
programme.desc: Master practical self-sufficiency skills, from household repairs to handmade projects, while learning to evaluate when DIY is better than buying. Discover how to choose quality materials and tools that make your creations last.

programme.title: Nature’s Magic: Unique Traditional Crafts and Processes
programme.desc: Step into the world of traditional craftsmanship and creativity! Discover how a coconut becomes a beautiful Indian musical instrument, how tree resin turns into a unique and tasty drink, and how fabric is made at home from recycled materials—just like our grandmothers used to do! Plus, see how palm bark is transformed into strong fibers for threading. A journey through nature, culture, and handmade magic!

programme.title: Creative Bonding Through Smart Hacks And Crafts
programme.desc: Engage kids with viral activity hacks that turn learning into play, while crafting sentimental gifts like fingerprint jewelry or custom photo frames. These projects build memories while celebrating special family connections.

programme.title: Repair Hacks for Beginners and PRO!
programme.desc: Discover ingenious plumbing solutions, renovation shortcuts, and self-made repair tools—all crafted from natural elements and traditional methods. No plastic, no waste—just the pure, sustainable brilliance of hands-on ingenuity!

programme.title: Easy Beauty Hacks for Men
programme.desc: Discover quick and easy beauty hacks every guy should know! From skincare tips to grooming tricks, these smart ideas will help you look and feel your best with minimal effort. Perfect for anyone who wants to upgrade their self-care routine without the fuss.

programme.title: Search for the Ghost Bears
programme.desc: Our film journey begins in Alaskas west. We are hoping to find glacier bears in the glacial regions of the Katmai National Park on the Douglas River. At the end of July, brown bears have now arrived to fish for salmon. In the surrounding forests, grizzlies look for berries and fresh, green twigs. The Katmai is Alaskas most volcanic area, and with 15 active volcanoes it is a veritable powder keg, surrounded by glaciers. In the Hook glacier region moose and lynx accompany us. Bald eagles have arrived at the glacial boundary and begin to tear apart their freshly caught prey. At last, we catch sight of a glacier bear. Hungry, he has left the ice region and has been forced down here in...

programme.title: mareTV: Sardinia - Magical Island in the Mediterranean
programme.desc: Sardinia is the second-largest island in the Mediterranean. The Sardin-ians themselves say its a "continent for itself", a virtual world of its own, full of magic: A beach, gleaming in unreal pink shades, red corals protect against the evil eye and the inhabitants seem to remain forever young. On Sardinia, the owners of luxury yachts adopt sheep, fish have gold in their bellies and a giant mussel supplies the material for legendary sea silk. No one is surprised, that the Madonna goes on a sea cruise once a year.

programme.title: mareTV: Capri and the Amalfi Coast - Italys Ocean Legends
programme.desc: Capri was already in ancient times a place for the rich and beautiful. Today Capri is one of the most famous islands in the world. Millions of tourists visit it. But there are in fact still unknown corners on the island in the Gulf of Naples. Thus, at the very top of Capri, there is a hermit monastery with a view to the Vesuvius.

programme.title: Italy My Love
programme.desc: In ten coastal areas of Italy, we encounter people that have a very special relationship with their region. All of them love their country, their traditions and their work. We met with enthusiasts and hedonists that permitted us to take a glimpse into their everyday lives. Young Italians, who have rediscovered nature and its treasures. Others, that preserve the beauty, archaeologists that apply whole new methods, farmers that only cultivate that which the soil needs. Fishermen, who fish in the same way as it was done a century ago and tough, young men who play and dance the Tarantella. Dolphins, giant sea turtles and pink flamingos, which are researched, nursed back to health or simply...

programme.title: mareTV: Corsica - Fascinating Mountain World in the Mediterranean
programme.desc: Corsica looks like an alpine landscape in the Mediterranean, an island with dramatic rock formations, romantic bays and proud inhabitants who see themselves first and foremost as Corsicans and only then as French. The Greeks in ancient times called the island Kalliste: the beautiful. We explore this fascinating mountain world in the Mediterranean.

programme.title: mareTV: Santorini - The Beauty on the Powder Keg
programme.desc: The Santorini archipelago is a gem, but is located on a veritable powder keg. It is only a matter of time before the volcano, the crater rim of which gave us this island world, erupts again. Since January 2011, threatening rumblings have been perceived beneath the archipelago. On Santorini, its a case of getting nowhere fast without a mule. Whether the restaurant terraces above the abyss of Oia, the hotels on the breath-taking cliffs of Imerovigli or Firostefani, it was only with the help of the stubborn climbing artists, that these daring constructions were made possible. Antonis Vlachos has ten strong mules that work for him. He transports almost everything with them: stones, food or...

programme.title: mareTV: The Blue and White Island World of Greece: Mykonos, Naxos and Tinos
programme.desc: Around the once sacred Isle of Delos, some 200 islands, including 20 larger ones, are arranged almost in a circle. This is where the name of the Greek island paradise comes from: Cyclades, a derivation of the Greek word kýklos, circle. Each cyclade has a unique character. The pelican Petros, about 20 years old, is the mascot of Mykonos. He moves from taverna to taverna all day long, scrounging fish. This works out sometimes well and sometimes not so well. Petros does have a few human friends who regularly slip him something, but all too often visitors eager to take pictures block his path. Then he has to "wiggle" his way through the crowd. Jackie Onassis is said to have once brought...

programme.title: The Turkish Riviera - The flair of antiquity and a turquoise sea
programme.desc: With a coastline boasting miles of bathing beaches, turquoise waters, breath-taking cliffs whilst being steeped in history, the Turkish riviera was even a fa-vourite of the Ancient Greeks, Romans and Ottomans, who all loved the mild climate and the lush landscape. Near the ruins of the ancient city of Side, Menderes Akdemir works on the latest attraction aimed at Riviera holidaymakers: his spooky pirate ship "Big Kral" is due to leave dry dock and head for the sea. Mehmet Özata came up with a very clever idea: to be able to cope with the basically ruinous puffer fish plague along the coastline, he produces a selection of leather utensils made of their skin. The islands that surround the...

programme.title: Montenegro - From the Black Mountains to the Beach
programme.desc: The Balkan land of Montenegro owes its name to the Black Mountains. But there is so much more: steep cliffs, deep gorges, picturesque lakes, orthodox monasteries, Venetian architecture, sandy beaches and even fjords like those of Norway. There are three climate zones alone in the Adriatic. The inhabitants still try to find their way between the challenges of a post-socialist system, the much-vaunted Balkan remoteness and the opportunities of a still almost completely undiscovered tourist destination in Europe.

programme.title: North Macedonia: Between Traditional Dances and Mini Navy
programme.desc: Northern Macedonia emerged from being a once constituent republic of the former Yugoslavia. Anyone wishing to discover unknown worlds has every chance of finding them in this young Balkan country, full of imposing mountains, lakes of crystal-clear water, original villages and centuries-old customs. Nevertheless, Northern Macedonia, which borders Serbia in the north and Greece in the south, considered to be one of the poorest countries in Europe.

programme.title: Italys Uncharted Islands
programme.desc: The Sulcis Archipelago is located off the south-western coast of Sardinia and is part of the province of of southern Sardinia. The islands of San Pietro, SantAntioco and Isola Piana form the archipelago, together with several uninhabited islets and rocks form the archipelago. It belongs to the less known areas in Italy and is little developed for tourism. Nevertheless stars like Tom Cruise and Roberto Cavalli come here to enjoy the peace, seclusion and good food. The islanders are only moderately interested in these visitors, and their down-to-earth attitude has never lost.

programme.title: Italys Uncharted Islands
programme.desc: Lake Iseo is located on the southern foothills of the Alps. It extends over the provinces of Brescia and Bergamo in the northern mainland of Italy. In the middle of Lake Iseo lies the largest island of the southern European inland waters. Monte Isola, as the island is called after its central mountain lies close to its two neighboring islands, Isola di San Paolo and Isola di Loreto. As early as the 11th century, a monastic association of Benedictines settled here. For many Italians, Lake Iseo is the most beautiful spot in their homeland. It is all the more astonishing how little the influence of tourism is here. Driving is strictly forbidden on the three islands, and only on Monte Isola....

programme.title: Italys Uncharted Islands
programme.desc: The Tuscan Archipelago is a group of islands at the height of Florence. The archipelago stretches from the Ligurian Sea to the Tyrrhenian Sea, north-east of Corsica. The archipelago consists of seven main islands - Giglio, Elba, Gianutri, Capraia, Pianisoa, Gorgona and Montecristo - and other smaller islands and rocks. Not all of them are inhabited. We look at the three most extraordinary islands of the archipelago: Elba, Capraia and the island of Montecristo. The Tuscan Archipelago is one of the most important natural wonders of the world and is protected as Parco Nazionale dellArcipelago Toscano. With its 61.474 hectares of protected and 17,694 hectares of protected land area, it is...

programme.title: Italys Uncharted Islands
programme.desc: Far from the glamour and spotlight of Lampedusa, Pantelleria is one of the best kept secrets among the Italian islands. Located closer to Tunisia than to the Italian mainland, Pantelleria closer to Tunisia than to the Italian mainland, Pantelleria has been nicknamed "The Last Island," a title also given by Giosuè Calaciura gave to his 2016 historical novel set on Pantelleria. Pantelleria, that is the island of lava, capers and of the liqueur wine that comes here Zibibbo. An island with an ancient history, where for centuries farmers and fishermen have pursued their craft. their craft. The famous Zibibbo grapes are cultivated here - among other things also on the vineyard that Gerard...

programme.title: Dream Islands Of Europe: Capri, Ischia and Procida
programme.desc: Capri and Ischia are world famous. From Naples, its just a short hop over to the two islands. Perfect destinations, then, for a weeks cruise along the Gulf of Naples and the adjoining Amalfi Coast to the south. There, Positano, Amalfi or Salerno as well as a handful of other mostly small harbor towns are extremely worthwhile destinations.

programme.title: mareTV: Venice - Lagoon and Legend
programme.desc: Venice has been attracting people as if by magic for centuries. The Italians call her La Serenissima, or the sublime. Perched on wooden posts, she braves the elements and the huge, annual surge of visitors. Vogalonga is the name of a Venetian sports competition for women, in which the participants row their boats standing. This is a tradition that Guilia and Elena also follow. They train hard, as the yearly regatta is soon to begin. Anyone caught driving their water vehicle with more than 7 km/h through the canals of Venice, risks getting a ticket from local policewoman Lorenza Mariutti. The reason: the resulting waves gnaw at the foundations of the grand palaces. Venetians are very...

programme.desc: The Santorini archipelago is a gem, but is located on a veritable powder keg. It is only a matter of time before the volcano, the crater rim of which gave us this island world, erupts again. Since January 2011, threatening rumblings have been perceived beneath the archipelago. On Santorini, its a case of getting nowhere fast without a mule. Whether the restaurant terraces above the abyss of Oia, the hotels on the breath-taking cliffs of Imerovigli or Firostefani, it was only with the help of the stubborn climbing artists, that these daring constructions were made possible. Antonis Vlachos has ten strong mules that work for him. He transports almost everything with them: stones, food or...

programme.title: mareTV: The Blue and White Island World of Greece: Mykonos, Naxos and Tinos
programme.desc: Around the once sacred Isle of Delos, some 200 islands, including 20 larger ones, are arranged almost in a circle. This is where the name of the Greek island paradise comes from: Cyclades, a derivation of the Greek word kýklos, circle. Each cyclade has a unique character. The pelican Petros, about 20 years old, is the mascot of Mykonos. He moves from taverna to taverna all day long, scrounging fish. This works out sometimes well and sometimes not so well. Petros does have a few human friends who regularly slip him something, but all too often visitors eager to take pictures block his path. Then he has to "wiggle" his way through the crowd. Jackie Onassis is said to have once brought...

programme.title: The Turkish Riviera - The flair of antiquity and a turquoise sea
programme.desc: With a coastline boasting miles of bathing beaches, turquoise waters, breath-taking cliffs whilst being steeped in history, the Turkish riviera was even a fa-vourite of the Ancient Greeks, Romans and Ottomans, who all loved the mild climate and the lush landscape. Near the ruins of the ancient city of Side, Menderes Akdemir works on the latest attraction aimed at Riviera holidaymakers: his spooky pirate ship "Big Kral" is due to leave dry dock and head for the sea. Mehmet Özata came up with a very clever idea: to be able to cope with the basically ruinous puffer fish plague along the coastline, he produces a selection of leather utensils made of their skin. The islands that surround the...

programme.title: Montenegro - From the Black Mountains to the Beach
programme.desc: The Balkan land of Montenegro owes its name to the Black Mountains. But there is so much more: steep cliffs, deep gorges, picturesque lakes, orthodox monasteries, Venetian architecture, sandy beaches and even fjords like those of Norway. There are three climate zones alone in the Adriatic. The inhabitants still try to find their way between the challenges of a post-socialist system, the much-vaunted Balkan remoteness and the opportunities of a still almost completely undiscovered tourist destination in Europe.

programme.title: North Macedonia: Between Traditional Dances and Mini Navy
programme.desc: Northern Macedonia emerged from being a once constituent republic of the former Yugoslavia. Anyone wishing to discover unknown worlds has every chance of finding them in this young Balkan country, full of imposing mountains, lakes of crystal-clear water, original villages and centuries-old customs. Nevertheless, Northern Macedonia, which borders Serbia in the north and Greece in the south, considered to be one of the poorest countries in Europe.

programme.title: Italys Uncharted Islands
programme.desc: The Sulcis Archipelago is located off the south-western coast of Sardinia and is part of the province of of southern Sardinia. The islands of San Pietro, SantAntioco and Isola Piana form the archipelago, together with several uninhabited islets and rocks form the archipelago. It belongs to the less known areas in Italy and is little developed for tourism. Nevertheless stars like Tom Cruise and Roberto Cavalli come here to enjoy the peace, seclusion and good food. The islanders are only moderately interested in these visitors, and their down-to-earth attitude has never lost.

programme.title: Italys Uncharted Islands
programme.desc: Lake Iseo is located on the southern foothills of the Alps. It extends over the provinces of Brescia and Bergamo in the northern mainland of Italy. In the middle of Lake Iseo lies the largest island of the southern European inland waters. Monte Isola, as the island is called after its central mountain lies close to its two neighboring islands, Isola di San Paolo and Isola di Loreto. As early as the 11th century, a monastic association of Benedictines settled here. For many Italians, Lake Iseo is the most beautiful spot in their homeland. It is all the more astonishing how little the influence of tourism is here. Driving is strictly forbidden on the three islands, and only on Monte Isola....

programme.title: Italys Uncharted Islands
programme.desc: The Tuscan Archipelago is a group of islands at the height of Florence. The archipelago stretches from the Ligurian Sea to the Tyrrhenian Sea, north-east of Corsica. The archipelago consists of seven main islands - Giglio, Elba, Gianutri, Capraia, Pianisoa, Gorgona and Montecristo - and other smaller islands and rocks. Not all of them are inhabited. We look at the three most extraordinary islands of the archipelago: Elba, Capraia and the island of Montecristo. The Tuscan Archipelago is one of the most important natural wonders of the world and is protected as Parco Nazionale dellArcipelago Toscano. With its 61.474 hectares of protected and 17,694 hectares of protected land area, it is...

programme.title: Italys Uncharted Islands
programme.desc: Far from the glamour and spotlight of Lampedusa, Pantelleria is one of the best kept secrets among the Italian islands. Located closer to Tunisia than to the Italian mainland, Pantelleria closer to Tunisia than to the Italian mainland, Pantelleria has been nicknamed "The Last Island," a title also given by Giosuè Calaciura gave to his 2016 historical novel set on Pantelleria. Pantelleria, that is the island of lava, capers and of the liqueur wine that comes here Zibibbo. An island with an ancient history, where for centuries farmers and fishermen have pursued their craft. their craft. The famous Zibibbo grapes are cultivated here - among other things also on the vineyard that Gerard...

programme.title: Lions On The Move
programme.desc: Not only are the animals regularly rotated into new enclosures to prevent repetitive behaviour developing out of boredom, but Kevin also has to practice loading them in and out of the van. Can the reluctant lions and hyenas eventually be persuaded to get on board with the move?

programme.title: The Dying King
programme.desc: In the open wilderness of Africa, there are only 20.000 lions living a free life. In the last decade, humans have killed hundreds of thousands– mostly for purely hunting purposes. In the last couple of years, a new industry has developed called the canned hunting, where animals are bred for 4-5 years then released into a confined area. This confined area is created for the sole purpose optimizing the odds of the hunter obtaining a kill. The corpse of the dead, often male, lion is thereby treated as a trophy. Tourists pay up to 40, 000 USD for this privilege.

programme.title: White Lions: Born Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 White Lions: Born Wild - Episode 1: Against all Odds
programme.desc: The two sisters are born as white as snow in May 2009 in South Africa’s Kruger Park. Growing up in this vast, wild wilderness they must not only overcome the same survival challenges that all young lion cubs face, they must also overcome the threats their high visibility brings. In the African bush, anything unusual stands out and is often eliminated by eagle-eyed predators. Will our cubs survive? The odds are stacked against them – 80 percent of all newborn lion cubs don’t make it to adulthood.

programme.title: White Lions: Born Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 White Lions: Born Wild - Episode 2: Fight for Survival
programme.desc: ‘White Lions – Born Wild’ is a true wildlife story, with strong characters and closely studied behaviour. We follow the cubs’ progress as they embark on the pathway to adulthood, learning to hunt, learning to avoid danger, learning to live in their white coats. This is a strong behaviour-led film, a coming-of-age story of a very rare and unusual pair of lions. Through their eyes, we learn what it is really like to be a lion in Africa.

programme.title: Masai Mara: The Big Hunt
programme.desc: When food supply in the Serengeti dwindles, the Masai Mara is a paradise for predators. As the black wildebeests, gazelles, zebras and antelopes make their yearly trip from the south of the Serengeti to the north, nature’s best laid trap, the Mara River in Kenya is waiting ahead. Captivating shots filmed under water show how crocodiles prepare for the Big Hunt while other predators lurk on the banks awaiting their bounty. The biggest problems for the migratory animals are the Mara and the Tarek River, where they have to put their lives at risk to get to the other side. A great number of them die as they jump into the river and break their legs, while others are carried away by the drift...

programme.title: Namibia`s Desert Kingdom
programme.desc: Although the dunes are barren, the dry riverbeds show signs of growth. And out of the heat, vast shapes appear. A herd of desert elephants ambles along the dry riverbed sniffing the ground with their lazy trunks. These remarkable creatures can smell the water underground and know where to find it. An abandoned well attracts a troop of chacma baboons, followed by a small herd of oryx and springbok, and finally a group of jackals. None of them has seen the pride of desert lions lying in wait.

programme.title: Dust And Stripes
programme.desc: In a never-ending quest for grass and water, the striped herds undertake an annual epic trek across the vast lunar landscape of the Kalahari’s Makgadikgadi Pans. Most of the year, the Makgadikgadi is an inhospitable wasteland of windswept, salt-encrusted pans. For the area’s water-dependent zebra, the Boteti River on the western edge of the pans is a dry-season lifeline. However, it is also a death trap, with lions waiting in ambush and crocodiles lurking in dark riverside caves.

programme.title: The Original Fight Club: Animal Fights Caught on Camera
programme.desc: There are many reasons for animals to fight and each have their own weapons and rules of combat. They rarely fight without good reason: usually to defend a patch, secure a meal or to attract a mate. With so many reasons for warfare, life can be a never ending battle – for all creatures no matter how great or small, life is a struggle – but they endure – perhaps because there is a fighter in us all …

programme.title: Close up with Hippos
programme.desc: This nature documentary shows the many different sides of the Hippo’s lives on one September day in two iconic African locations: the Masai Mara-Nationalpark in Kenya, also the setting for the largest annual animal migration on the planet – one and a half million wildebeests and zebras migrate from the Serengeti to Kenya during this time.

programme.title: The Incredible Five - A Cheetahs Tale
programme.desc: Cheetahs are the high-speed hunters of the Savannah. Few attempt to take on larger prey than gazelles or smallish antelopes. But on occasion, the predatory cats reveal their surprisingly different side. In the Northern Serengeti, a group of male cheetahs emerges and turns all we know about them upside down. Males are usually loners or live in small groups, but here we have five tomcats hunting together as one. It is actually, the largest alliance of the animals ever seen! This film has many stories to tell about the sleek hunters.

programme.title: Hoanib - The Secret of the Desert Elephants
programme.desc: The Namib, one of the most hostile deserts on Earth. Without a firm survival strategy, no living soul will make it here. Yet, surprisingly, some species have adapted their lifestyles to these extreme conditions: chameleons, beetles, snakes and mammals are all at home here. The film follows a family of desert elephants that has also adapted to this habitat.

programme.title: Elephants: Back to the Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Elephants: Back to the Wild: The Orphanage of Elephants - Nairobi Nationalpark
programme.desc: We follow the rescue of a baby elephant. Once rescued, it will be transported by plane to the breeding station and raised with love and commitment. In order to satisfy the little pachyderm’s urge to move while in the breeding station, there is sometimes an adorable football match between the animals.

programme.title: Elephants: Back to the Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Elephants: Back to the Wild: The Return of the Elephants - Tsavo-East-Nationalpark
programme.desc: We accompany the first steps of a two-year-old elephant who is just starting his release program. We also observe the story of two young elephants in their first night in the wilderness on their own. Captivating film footage allows us to truly learn how elephants behave in the wild.

programme.title: Lions On The Move
programme.desc: Kevin Richardson shares an extraordinary bond with Africa’s most fearsome predators. Together with them, he has experienced some real adventures. However, transporting 27 lions and 14 hyenas to a new home presents a different challenge.The lions new home will be a sanctuary on the edge of Dinokeng, a South African game reserve spanning 18,000 square metres. The huge task ahead includes planning and designing the new enclosures, and securing permits to move the animals.

programme.title: Lions On The Move
programme.desc: Not only are the animals regularly rotated into new enclosures to prevent repetitive behaviour developing out of boredom, but Kevin also has to practice loading them in and out of the van. Can the reluctant lions and hyenas eventually be persuaded to get on board with the move?

programme.title: The Dying King
programme.desc: In the open wilderness of Africa, there are only 20.000 lions living a free life. In the last decade, humans have killed hundreds of thousands– mostly for purely hunting purposes. In the last couple of years, a new industry has developed called the canned hunting, where animals are bred for 4-5 years then released into a confined area. This confined area is created for the sole purpose optimizing the odds of the hunter obtaining a kill. The corpse of the dead, often male, lion is thereby treated as a trophy. Tourists pay up to 40, 000 USD for this privilege.

The odds are stacked against them – 80 percent of all newborn lion cubs don’t make it to adulthood.

programme.title: Close up with Hippos
programme.desc: This nature documentary shows the many different sides of the Hippo’s lives on one September day in two iconic African locations: the Masai Mara-Nationalpark in Kenya, also the setting for the largest annual animal migration on the planet – one and a half million wildebeests and zebras migrate from the Serengeti to Kenya during this time.

programme.title: Germanys Wild Amazon
programme.desc: As one of Germany’s beauties, the river was the gem of Germanys landscape. But with industrialization it became the country’s hardest working river and like everything that has been overworked, it lost it magnificence and charm. Due to tender love and care, the river is now a reigning example of one of the most successful and outstanding renaturation projects in the country.The film shows never before seen shots of the river now pulsing with life. We will show you the winding river bed, spawning salmon, mating crabs and still-growing anchor ice. You will see dipper birds searching for food under water, kingfishers catching fish, a family life of badgers, foxes and a wide variety of birds....

programme.title: Wild River Rhine
programme.desc: Alluvial forests, roaring waterfalls, steep canyons and sunny slopes flank the river Rhine. The variety of habitats is the reason for the large biodiversity along the stream.There is hardly any other river in Germany that is surrounded by as many myths and legends as the river Rhine. No other river has been the topic of songs, has been painted and travelled equally frequently. Despite this it still seems to be true today what the French poet Victor Hugo once said about this river – the Rhine is a river everybody talks about, nobody explores, everybody visits but no one really knows. The film follows the water against the stream. It starts at the river’s delta in the Netherlands, flows...

programme.desc: Africanews is the only independent national and international news channel from an African perspective. It reports breaking news from the continent, delivers unbiased reporting and is available on TV and digital platforms.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto etsii kauan kadoksissa ollutta kansainyhteison johtajaa, joka on mennyt piiloon.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromedan tehtavana on saattaa laakintaaluksia turvallisesti Drago-Kazovin avaruuden lapi.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylanin entisen morsiamen johtama Kansainyhteison selviytyjista koostuva planeetta kutsutaan liittymaan uuteen Kansainyhteisoon.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Abyssin agentti yrittaa houkutella Harperin liittymaan Magogiin.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kun he pelastavat nuoren prinssin kapinasta, joka tappaa hanen perheensa, Dylania ja Tyria pyydetaan hanen neuvonantajikseen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Harperin Magogin munat alkavat kuoriutua, joten ryhma rakentaa Teseract-koneen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan ottaa haltuunsa turistiproomun yrittaessaan paeta palkkasotureita.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Ruumiin tunnistaminen menee pieleen, kun kay ilmi, etta Bekan entinen miehistotoveri ei olekaan kuollut.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda pelastaa kuolevia ihmisia ajelehtimasta, mutta he muuttuvat pian zombeiksi, joita hallitsee pesamieli.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Musta aukko tyrmaa Dylanin ja lahettaa hanet vaihtoehtoiseen todellisuuteen, jossa hanella on vaimo ja lapsi.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto pelastaa yhden kauan kadonneista Commonwealth-perustajista, mutta huomaa, etta hanella voi olla enemman ongelmia kuin han on arvoltaan.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Mytologinen avaruushirvio yrittaa syoda Andromedan.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan yrittaa vapauttaa vangittujen alusten laivaston, mutta laivasto ei ole varma, haluaako se tulla vapautetuksi. Niiden tekoalyt pelkaavat, etta uudet kapteenit orjuuttavat ne.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan isannoi viidenkymmenen osapuolen kanssa Uuden Kansainyhteison peruskirjan allekirjoittamista, mutta huomaa pian, etta tunkeilijat aikovat estaa allekirjoittamisen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka ja Tyr joutuvat ulottuvuustunnelin energian valtaan. Dylanin, Trancen ja Harperin on pelastettava heidat ennen kuin he tuhoavat aluksen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan lavastetaan syylliseksi murhaan, ja hanen on puhdistettava nimensa ja loydettava samalla maljakon osat, joiden sanotaan antavan omistajalleen "kosmoksen siunaukset".

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto pelastaa pakolaisryhman, mutta huomaa, etta he ovat joutuneet hallituksen kokeisiin ja ovat aarimmaisen epavakaita.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Bekan seta pyrkii virkaan Uudessa Kansainyhteisossa, mutta salamurhayritys saa miehiston toimimaan hanen turvamiehinaan.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto saa selville, etta Marduk-planeetta on luonut joukkotuhoaseita.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Leper niminen palkkamurhaaja on ottanut kohteekseen Uuden Kansainyhteison johtajat.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromedaa vainoaa salaperainen olento, joka tulee alukselle aurinkomyrskyn aikana.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kun kauan kadoksissa ollut rakkaus palaa, Tyr katoaa alukselta suojellakseen hanta salamurhaajalta.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Ryhma, joka hyokkasi Andromedan kimppuun kansainyhteison ensimmaisen peruskirjan allekirjoittamisen aikana, palaa aiheuttamaan lisaa tuhoa.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Trance kay lapi useita eri skenaarioita ja yrittaa loytaa sellaisen, jossa hanen miehistotoverinsa eivat kuole.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Tehokkaampi Andromedan alus rajahtaa todennakoisen sabotaasin vuoksi, ja Dylanin miehiston on pakko pelastaa heidat.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka vaarantaa seka miehistonsa etta kokonaisen planeetan, kun entinen rakkaus ilmestyy paikalle.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Kun Pyrianin pyroformerit hyokkaavat Kansainyhteison planeetalle, Dylan joutuu taistelemaan uuden planeetan suojelemiseksi.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan kuulee aania, jotka kutsuvat hanta tulen ja jaan planeetalle.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto joutuu kahden Nietzschean ylpeyden valiseen taisteluun vangitessaan vihamielisen, joka vaittaa, etta hanen ylpeydellaan on liukuvirran kartta.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Vaara kaanne liukuvirran poistumisen jalkeen lahettaa Andromedan Prolon-jarjestelmaan. He pelastavat Escape-podin tietyilta katastrofeilta, mutta ylpeys haluaa sen takaisin.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto asentaa uuden tekoalyn uuteen kansainyhteison taistelulaivaan, ja luonnollisesti asiat eivat suju niin kuin pitaisi.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Tyr vakuuttaa nietzschelaiset siita, etta han on Drago Musevenin reinkarnaatio.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Viesti kerailijalta lahettaa Dylanin pelastamaan panttivangin ja loytamaan Kansainyhteison laivaston jaannokset.

programme.title: Andromeda

programme.desc: The new Baywatch Hawaii team goes through trials and tribulations learning to work and live together.

programme.title: Weak Link
programme.desc: A dangerous contest puts Dawns future at Baywatch in doubt. Tanner befriends a dying girl.

programme.title: Shark Island
programme.desc: Mitch and Tanner explore Shark Island. Jessie and Kekoa dump JD. Jesse makes a rescue in the nude.

programme.title: Strike Team
programme.desc: Sean leads a daring rescue of 6 kayaking teens stranded off the perilous Na Pali coast.

programme.title: Sunday in Kauai
programme.desc: Jessie and Kekoa battle each other even as they rescue a man stranded behind a waterfall!

programme.title: Risk to Death
programme.desc: Sean threatens to fire Jason. Allie and Dawn have to save a pregnant woman giving birth in the ocean.

programme.title: Father of the Groom
programme.desc: Sean makes a life-or-death decision. Kekoa faces her fear. Mitch objects to Hobie getting married.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Jason, who fears sharks, learns first hand that they are sacred protectors of the Hawaiian Islands.

programme.title: Gold from the Deep
programme.desc: Allie discovers a rare Hawaiian coin that may be part of a priceless sunken treasure.

programme.title: Bent
programme.desc: Allie is terrified she may lose the love of her life when Nick attempts an impossible rescue.

programme.title: Path of Least Resistance
programme.desc: A dark secret from Dawns past could jeopardize her career as a Baywatch Hawaii Lifeguard.

programme.title: Liquid Visions
programme.desc: Dawn experiments with the powers of the mind. Disaster strikes a party boat.

programme.title: Lines in the Sand
programme.desc: When nudists protest, Sean and Jenna must work together to save the day.

programme.title: Thunder Tide
programme.desc: Kekoa, Dawn and Allie assess their femininity. Jason rehearses a love scene with a sexy actress.

programme.title: Breath of Life
programme.desc: Jason is assigned to a Beach where he confronts a terrible incident from his past.

programme.title: Big Island Heat
programme.desc: Sean vows to fight when Jenna tries to take over the team and shut down the training center.

programme.title: The Hero
programme.desc: Sean tells Jenna a secret that could cost his him job. Allie and Jason rescue victims on a lava reef.

programme.title: Maui Exterra
programme.desc: Jessie trains for a triathlon. Jason tracks an underwater spirit that lures people to their deaths.

programme.title: Baywatch Ohana
programme.desc: When Sean risks everything to save Jenna, his darkest secret is revealed.

programme.title: The Last Rescue
programme.desc: Jessies WWII Vet grandfather comes back to Hawaii to end his life. Can Mitch intervene in time?

programme.title: The Killing Machine
programme.desc: A government agent recruits Mitch for a lethal undercover assignment Mitch may not survive.

programme.title: Soul Survivor
programme.desc: Sean clashes with Jenna. A love triangle builds between Zack, Carrie and Jason.

programme.title: Knife in the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch faces a lawsuit after a rescue. Zack pursues Carrie while shes pursuing Jason.

programme.title: Bad Boyz
programme.desc: Jenna threatens to close Baywatch. Carrie’s fear may end her lifeguard career.

programme.title: Dangerous Game
programme.desc: Leigh goes hang gliding with perilous results. A party gone wrong finds Nani alone in the ocean.

programme.title: Stone Cold
programme.desc: Jason makes a desperate dive to retrieve a donor heart from a plane crash before the patient dies.

programme.title: Broken Promises
programme.desc: To avoid jail, Danny joins Team Baywatch. JD, Zack and Jason get conned by two gorgeous women.

programme.title: Dream Girl
programme.desc: Jenna betrays Sean. Kekoa admits love for JD. Zack encounters a ghostly woman from his dreams.

programme.title: The Cage
programme.desc: A Shark Tour operator endangers swimmers! JD and Kekoa try keeping their relationship a secret.

programme.title: Ben
programme.desc: Seans guilt over after a surfing accident leads to a perilous paddleboard outing.

programme.title: Ties that Bind
programme.desc: Zack and Jason befriend a man and his teenage daughter protecting a dangerous secret.

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: Leigh suspects a tourist of murdering her husband. Jason seduces the tourist with shocking results!

programme.title: Ex-Files
programme.desc: Fake rescue calls put lives in danger. JD wants Kekoa’s father to bless their relationship.

programme.title: The Stalker
programme.desc: Carrie saves a victim who begins stalking her. Leigh must choose between Sean and Sam.

programme.title: Father Faust
programme.desc: Baywatch faces two bizarre lawsuits. A government Investigation puts Sean’s job in jeopardy.

programme.title: Good Man in a Storm
programme.desc: Hurricane Honu hits Hawaii. Baywatch lifeguards battle to save lives, including their own!

programme.title: About an Age
programme.desc: It’s Friday night and five friends on the cusp of adulthood gather at a house to celebrate the end of another school week.

programme.title: The Map Reader
programme.desc: In a small New Zealand town, 16 year-old Michael leads a lonely, introverted existence with his single mother Amelia whose guilt and alcoholism threatens to drive her cherished son away. Uncomfortable with the adolescent exploits of his “friends,” he finds escape through a passionate love of maps.

programme.title: Astronaut: The Last Push
programme.desc: When a tragic accident cuts short the first manned mission to explore life on the moons of Jupiter, Michael Forrest must make the 3 year journey home to Earth in pure solitude.

programme.title: Cream Of The Crop
programme.desc: High-school Ag Science teacher Jodi Stafford meets commercial real-estate marketing specialist Mike Jared during her struggle to save her familys ailing dairy farm.

programme.title: The View From Here
programme.desc: After a bad review of his new restaurant, a Bay Area chef must learn to cope with his struggling relationship and the death of his father.

programme.title: Something Good Coming
programme.desc: After an unforeseen store closure, two grocery store workers from different backgrounds are stuck spending time together over a weekend.

programme.title: You with Me
programme.desc: It tells the story of Kim who lives with her overprotective parents and meets Jayson online. She then ends up moving to Seoul and starts a new life.

programme.title: Sugar!
programme.desc: A housewife of a Republican candidate for U.S. Senate secretly forms an all-women rock band turning her entire world up side down.

programme.title: Not Your Romeo and Juliet
programme.desc: With a popular romance column and a soul-mate, Micki has love all figured out -until a competing, anti-romance column rivals hers.

programme.title: Dog Park
programme.desc: Nick isnt lucky in love - until a trip to the Dog Park with his ex-girlfriends dog changes everything.

programme.title: Who Will Move The Stone
programme.desc: A worldly Detroit lawyer decides to represent a Born Again Christian on trial for the murder of a Catholic Priest.

programme.title: Lucky Louie
programme.desc: A retired cop teams up with four ex-convicts and a behavioral science student to solve a fifty year old bank robbery in this new faith filled family comedy.

programme.title: No Letting Go
programme.desc: What would you do to save your child? A young teenager struggles with a debilitating mental illness as his mom risks everything to save him without losing the rest of her family.

programme.title: The Day You Found Me
programme.desc: The passage of time does not diminish the childhood connection of two friends, a young boy and girl, bound by a promise.

programme.title: The Last Page
programme.desc: After being raised--and abused--in the foster-care system, twin brothers find refuge with a group of misfits who turn out to be a violent band of criminals.

programme.title: Rum Runners
programme.desc: Rum Runners is the epic story of two best friends, Vic Hanson and Don Calyer. They get caught running illegal booze across the Canadian border.

programme.title: Hope
programme.desc: A young man hits rock bottom and has nowhere to turn.

programme.title: July Rising
programme.desc: When sixteen-year old Andy inherits her grandfathers orchard and becomes the ward of her aunt from the city, she must navigate the path to her future from a small town.

programme.title: Maybe Im Fine
programme.desc: A young girl is asked to help get her father to sign divorce papers.

programme.title: Native Hearts
programme.desc: Daniel Finley, a mentally-ill Native American of mixed race, struggles to reconcile love versus inner trauma.

programme.title: Long-Distance Princess
programme.desc: A teen (Alicen Evans) faces a dilemma when the boy (Parker Harris) that she likes falls for her friend who lives overseas.

programme.title: Lake Effects
programme.desc: Sara and Lily grew up at Smith Mountain Lake. Sara became estranged from the family and without explanation moved to Los Angeles to study law.

programme.title: Of Dice and Men
programme.desc: The lives of six roleplaying gamer friends are thrown into upheaval when one of them enlists to go to Iraq. A geek movie without the self-loathing.

programme.title: Little Mermaid
programme.desc: A mermaid discovers harsh realities when she leaves the ocean to be with a human she barely knows.

programme.title: Aquarians
programme.desc: A wintertime drama about a seminary student who returns to his hometown and is compelled to reconnect with his estranged brother.

programme.title: Elle: A Modern Cinderella Tale
programme.desc: Elle (Ashlee Hewitt) is a girl who wants to be a singer and lives with her uncle, the owner of a small independent record label, after her parents died.

programme.title: Clarity
programme.desc: When 20-year-old Maggie collapses at a surprise celebration dinner, her family discover that she has a rare genetic kidney disorder.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: In an effort to control the city the Mayor opens the doors to the Russian Mob. It is not long until he realizes they arent going to follow his rules.

programme.title: A Different Sun
programme.desc: A Chinese family moves from their native land to a town in Germany and struggles to adjust to the different culture.

programme.title: The Colour of Darkness
programme.desc: All the colour, depth and mystery of Indias complex and riotous cultural heritage is brought to light in a single action which changes two countries forever.

programme.title: Apocalypse War
programme.desc: When two soul mates are trapped together at the end of World War III, their lives are forever entwined.

programme.title: Dead Men
programme.desc: Jesse Struthers and his brother Jake find themselves on the run after a band of men begin murdering their family.

programme.title: Texas Heart
programme.desc: A corrupt New York attorney fleeing the mob seeks refuge in a small Texas town where he stumbles upon a powerful reason to do good.

programme.title: Broken Ceiling
programme.desc: When Angela Walker is passed over for yet another promotion, she decides shes going to have to break through the invisible corporate barriers once and for all.

During a routine patrol, an Officer spots an intoxicated man assaulting a woman.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are flagged down and alerted to a group of armed men assaulting people at a nearby home. A fight between a father and his adult son takes a dark turn. A father threatens his daughter and her boyfriend with a knife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a man who attempted to cash a bad check then fled the scene. Police are called when a man’s ex-girlfriend breaks into his house. Police chase an unlicensed teen speeding in a vehicle

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Teens are arrested after authorities find an open container and drugs inside a vehicle. A suspect is arrested after fleeing the police. Officers respond to a fight involving two men and a shovel.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E32 I Always Pay My Debts
programme.desc: A man tries to bite an officer after narcotics are spotted in his mouth. Officers respond to a family fighting in their front yard. A suspect claims to be repaying a debt when hes caught buying drugs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple out for some fun get into trouble when they can’t wait to get home. The deputies of Alameda County set up a prostitution sting in a local hotel. Two women walking down Las Vegas Boulevard are stopped with suspicious drinks.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman bites the arresting officer and store manager after trying to steal beer. A passenger of a suspicious vehicle attempts to hide drugs. Police respond to a call involving a knife and two women.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E25 Hide and Go Porch
programme.desc: Officers engage in a car chase when they spot a possible robbery suspect. A man nicknamed “Danger” is tasered after assaulting several girls. Suspects bail from a vehicle and hide under a porch.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A knife wielding man hangs around the lot of a convenience store. An intoxicated man in speedos flees from the police after urinating in a parking lot. An Officer responds to a domestic dispute after a man locks his girlfriend in the bathroom.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man is arrested for stealing a large amount of copper wire from a business owner. A bicyclist is charged with possession and public intoxication. A man is pulled over for expired tags.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an armed robbery and carjacking, the suspects are arrested on several charges. A concerned sister reports a fight between her brother and a heavyset burglar. Officers pursue a stolen vehicle and a high speed chase ensues which ends in a wreck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies are called to a vehicle burglary in progress at an apartment complex. A traffic stop results in the discovery of drug paraphernalia. An Officer locates a stolen van and discovers drug paraphernalia in the suspect’s purse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A vehicle is caught traveling in the opposite direction. A sting operation is designed to nab suspects who purchase narcotics. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local thrift store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E14 We Know Who You Are
programme.desc: Officers are forced to taze a suicidal man for his own good. A familiar face makes cops chase him through a grass field. No lie is too big for a suspect who seeks refuge in a condemned house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E28 Slow Mo’ Drag Racer
programme.desc: Officers engage in a bizarre slow-speed chase after a suspect’s failure to stop. A woman is pulled over after leaving a known drug house. An Officer pursues two illegal drag racers on a public highway.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers discover a grand theft auto suspect hiding in his apartment. Officers assist the fire department in capturing a brown bear from a palm tree. Officers respond to a shooting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E29 The Last Home Invasion
programme.desc: Police investigate an attempted robbery that turned deadly. Officers enlist a K9 unit to flush out a suspect. A high-speed chase comes to an end when the suspect crashes into a fence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man in New Jersey is arrested for possession. A couple is pulled over while looking to score. A routine traffic stop turns into a fruitful drug bust.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect bites an Officer while trying to avoid arrest. An Officer responds to a stabbing. An Officer is flagged down by a concerned group looking for a missing 4-year-old.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E23 Bad Day, Bad Luck
programme.desc: A man is questioned for assaulting a woman on a train. Surveillance captured a man burglarizing a casino. A father kicks his son out of the house after his drinking becomes problematic.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man on parole dumps a stolen car and flees from officers on foot. A man denies stealing a wallet from a car with a smashed window. A hostile woman gives officers a false name.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.sub-title: S27 : E26 Eye in the Sky

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An angry customer threatens a store employee with a rock. Officers suspect the ‘medicine’ found in a suspect’s car is actually his business product. A stepfather gets into a fist fight.

programme.title: Cops

programme.desc: A suspect attempts to discard drugs during a foot chase. A man fails to pull over for minor infraction and then bails out his car on foot. A man is arrested after being spotted in a drug transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover officers organize a sting operation to catch drug users. A woman attempts to conceal drugs in her mouth during a routine search. A repeat offender is arrested after threatening offices.

programme.title: Cops

programme.desc: After a tow service employee denies a woman her car back, she uses his body for batting practice. A man with a warrant explains his medicinal meth use. No lie is too big for a couple trying to convince officers they didn’t shoplift.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The disturbing missing case in Paris of a four year old.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On October 13th 1996, the body of young Angelique Dumetz, 18 years old, is recovered down a ditch in Oise forest. An important clue is found on the crime scene.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On February 23th 2017, policemen are alerted of the disapearrance of Brigitte Troadec, her husband Pascal, and their children Sebastien and Charlotte.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Night of Horror at Devils Plateau (Marie-Jeanne Meyer Case) - On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her little sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. She never came back. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed, "The Devils Plateau." Whats more, the crime scene looked like a mystical ritual ... Was it a ritual murder? Revenge? An unfortunate encounter? ...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Valerie Bary Case)- On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood. According to the investigators initial findings, the 38-year-old nurses aid had been stabbed several times, seeming to validate the theory of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Bloody Christmas next to the Leman lake (CASE OF RUTH LÉGERET) - On January 4, 2006, Ruth Legeret was found dead in the middle of a pool of blood at her luxurious property in Vevey, Switzerland. Next to her was the lifeless body of her friend, Marina Studer. Who could have killed these two simple and wealthy widows? Clue after clue, the Swiss polices investigation would revolve around an environment of family jealousy and financial greed.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: September 16 2005. The lifeless body of Audrey Jouannet, 24, is found hidden under the bed in her small apartment in Soisy-sur-Seine. It soon becomes apparent that the young woman has been tortured at length before being strangled. But surprisingly, though the highly meticulous murderer has taken care to leave no sign of his passage, the autopsy reveals traces of sperm on the victim. It will take all of the investigators intuition to pierce the mystery of this heinous crime...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Sylvain Dromard finds the body of his wife Laurence lying in a pool of blood in the kitchen. The crime was particularly violent and the theory of a burglary that went wrong is soon excluded. But investigators dont understand who could want the adorable hairdresser of Saint-Martin-dAblois dead. During the investigation, the work of profilers will enable them to draw a very precise portrait of the murderer...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: After an ordinary dinner, Pierre and Gabrielle Labrell suffer severe abdominal pains.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Nelly Cremel, 39, leaves her home to go jogging... never to return. Eight days later, after a vast search campaign, her body is found. Theres no doubt that its murder. The case soon ignites public opinion, even inflaming passions at the highest level of the state. The clues lead investigators on a number of trails, from the shadows of the French secret service to a manhunt for a possible sex maniac, in a case of murder most foul.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Willy Pomonti, a retired architect, is found savagely murdered in his opulent villa in La Celle-Saint-Cloud, near Paris. It soon becomes clear that the man has been tortured prior to death. At several points during this extraordinary enquiry, police will feel theyre holding the culprit... It will take them ten years to finally shed light on this particularly violent crime.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless body of Christophe Lejard is found by his son just metres from their home. The man was shot in the head as he was getting into his car to go to work. A veritable execution, which at first glance doesnt square with the profile of the quiet family man. Yet behind the appearances, the investigation gradually reveals all the hate and resentment that revolved around the victim.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A man walks into a gendarmerie near Saint-Malo to report that his wife has been missing since the previous day. The couple are going through a divorce, but this mother would never have left her seven children alone! An extensive search is undertaken but the woman cannot be found. What has happened to Adeline Piet? The investigation spans several years and experiences many twists.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and -an extra sordid detail - a devil mask is found next to her body. Was Priscillia the victim of a prowler? A serial killer? A maniac inspired by a horror movie? Investigators soon find that the young girl felt she was being watched, and even threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: In the early hours of the morning, Mathilde Croguennec, 18, attending "Teknival" in Brittany, is found at the foot of a tree with her throat cut. Investigators face the task of finding the killer from among the 43,000 participants of this huge open-air festival of electronic music, where drink and drugs are consumed in abundance. An unusual investigation that leads the police down a number of false avenues.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Arriving at her work, the secretary of a small firm in the suburbs of Geneva finds the body of Jean-Raymond Blatti, the companys new accountant. The man is lying in a pool of blood and, on his belly, the murderer has written "DIRTY RAPIST". Yet Jean-Raymond Blatti was never charged with sexual assault. Over the course of the investigation, this inscription will appear as one of the many mysteries of this case which is particularly rich in twists and turns.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 19th 2004, the naked and tied up body of a woman is recovered in the Ourcq canal in Fresnes-sur-Marne. The victim is impossible to identify.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On April 3th 2003, Chantal Ternik, a 48 year old housewife, is discovered hanged in her house of Sanary-sur-Mer, in Var.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Electric Vehicles
programme.desc: This film follows the emerging world of Electric Vehicles, the infrastructure needed for them, and the radical change we must make to the way we think about transport.

programme.title: The Metaverse
programme.desc: This episode is about an idea, the Metaverse. The Metaverse is the successor to the internet. It will change the lives of almost every human on the planet.

programme.title: Hyperloop
programme.desc: Virgin Hyperloop is a train that runs inside a steel tunnel. This revolutionary new vehicle floats along the track using magnetic levitation and glides at airline speeds.

programme.title: The Race to Space
programme.desc: A new era of space, where small satellites no bigger than a shoebox will be deployed not in one or twos, but in their thousands, referred to as satellite swarms.

programme.title: Perpetual Power
programme.desc: All over the world, engineers and scientists are racing to solve one key problem; how to safely and efficiently store electricity at a huge scale but at a low cost.

programme.title: Timber Skyscraper
programme.desc: This film explores the mind-blowing world of timber buildings for a more sustainable future.

programme.title: Asteroid Belt Discovery
programme.desc: New evidence from NASAs Dawn mission to Ceres, a dwarf planet the size of Texas.

programme.title: Space Junk Dangers
programme.desc: A ballistic missile test by India recently shot down one of its own communications satellites.

programme.title: Mars InSight: Seven Minutes to Touchdown
programme.desc: The fate of the Mars InSight lander will all come down to a fiery seven-minute freefall into the Red Planet. Will it survive?

programme.title: Exoplanets
programme.desc: NASA may have just gotten one step closer to answering the question: are we alone? The Spitzer Telescope has made a groundbreaking discovery of exoplanets.

programme.title: Cassini: The Grand Finale
programme.desc: Twenty years after its launch, we bid farewell to the Cassini spacecraft as it plunges into Saturn’s atmosphere in a planned death spiral.

programme.title: Asteroids, Comets, and Meteors
programme.desc: How do these objects differ from one another, if at all? Nick Moskovitz, an astronomer at the Lowell Observatory, compares these two space solar system bodies.

programme.title: New Horizons: The Kuiper Belt Target
programme.desc: The New Horizons spacecraft revolutionized our understanding of the solar system as it rocketed past Pluto. Now, the craft approaches its next target…Ultima Thule.

programme.title: Direct From An Asteroid
programme.desc: The Hayabusa2 spacecraft has just completed one of the most intricate procedures in space exploration.

programme.title: The First Picture of a Black Hole
programme.desc: For the first time, scientists have captured a photograph of a black hole.

programme.title: Touching the Sun
programme.desc: NASAs Parker Probe Plus is on a mission to learn more about the Sun -- flying through dangerous radiation to become the closest spaceship to orbit our Sun.

programme.title: Private Moonshot
programme.desc: A non-profit organization established in 2011 is aiming to land the first Israeli spacecraft on the Moon. This is the story of their attempt and the excitement of being the first private company to have a spacecraft launched with the intention of going to and landing on the moon.

programme.title: Modern Day Killer Asteroid
programme.desc: 66 million years ago, an asteroid slammed into Mexico’s Yucatán Peninsula, causing a dinosaur mass extinction. Whats in store for humanity if it happens again?

programme.title: Hayabusa2: Asteroid Explosion
programme.desc: Hayabusa2 just became the first spacecraft to take subsurface samples of an asteroid. How did they do it?

programme.title: Saturn: The Moon King
programme.desc: The latest developments in space technology continue to reveal the wonders of our solar system. With new moons recently spotted orbiting Saturn, the gas giant has taken the lead in our cosmic neighborhoods moon count.

programme.title: Artemis: First Launch
programme.desc: This is an inside look at NASAs groundbreaking Artemis Program, the spacecraft, and the people who will bring humanity one step closer to the moon, Mars, and beyond.

programme.title: First Images: The James Webb Telescope
programme.desc: The dawn of a new era in astronomy has begun as the world gets its first look at the full capabilities of NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope.

programme.title: Mars: The Journey
programme.desc: The faint red glow of Mars has intrigued those watching it from Earth for centuries. Now space exploration has begun to lift the veil on "The Red Planet".

programme.title: Asteroid Belt Discovery
programme.desc: New evidence from NASAs Dawn mission to Ceres, a dwarf planet the size of Texas.

programme.desc: Twenty years after its launch, we bid farewell to the Cassini spacecraft as it plunges into Saturn’s atmosphere in a planned death spiral.

programme.title: Asteroids, Comets, and Meteors
programme.desc: How do these objects differ from one another, if at all? Nick Moskovitz, an astronomer at the Lowell Observatory, compares these two space solar system bodies.

programme.title: New Horizons: The Kuiper Belt Target
programme.desc: The New Horizons spacecraft revolutionized our understanding of the solar system as it rocketed past Pluto. Now, the craft approaches its next target…Ultima Thule.

programme.title: Direct From An Asteroid
programme.desc: The Hayabusa2 spacecraft has just completed one of the most intricate procedures in space exploration.

programme.title: The First Picture of a Black Hole
programme.desc: For the first time, scientists have captured a photograph of a black hole.

programme.title: Touching the Sun
programme.desc: NASAs Parker Probe Plus is on a mission to learn more about the Sun -- flying through dangerous radiation to become the closest spaceship to orbit our Sun.

programme.title: Private Moonshot
programme.desc: A non-profit organization established in 2011 is aiming to land the first Israeli spacecraft on the Moon. This is the story of their attempt and the excitement of being the first private company to have a spacecraft launched with the intention of going to and landing on the moon.

programme.title: Modern Day Killer Asteroid
programme.desc: 66 million years ago, an asteroid slammed into Mexico’s Yucatán Peninsula, causing a dinosaur mass extinction. Whats in store for humanity if it happens again?

programme.title: Hayabusa2: Asteroid Explosion
programme.desc: Hayabusa2 just became the first spacecraft to take subsurface samples of an asteroid. How did they do it?

programme.title: Saturn: The Moon King
programme.desc: The latest developments in space technology continue to reveal the wonders of our solar system. With new moons recently spotted orbiting Saturn, the gas giant has taken the lead in our cosmic neighborhoods moon count.

programme.title: Artemis: First Launch
programme.desc: This is an inside look at NASAs groundbreaking Artemis Program, the spacecraft, and the people who will bring humanity one step closer to the moon, Mars, and beyond.

programme.title: First Images: The James Webb Telescope
programme.desc: The dawn of a new era in astronomy has begun as the world gets its first look at the full capabilities of NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope.

programme.title: Mars: The Journey
programme.desc: The faint red glow of Mars has intrigued those watching it from Earth for centuries. Now space exploration has begun to lift the veil on "The Red Planet".

programme.title: Abe Lincoln
programme.desc: A man who had no education, no money, came from no background of anything meaningful, and yet he would rise to become the President of the United States.

programme.title: Babe Ruth
programme.desc: A century after he transformed baseball, celebrity culture, and the American experience, the Babe, the Sultan of Swat, the Bambino - Babe Ruth remains.

programme.title: FDR
programme.desc: Franklin Delano Roosevelt is remembered for overcoming the toughest possible challenges. Staring down the Depression, staring down the Nazis, saving democracy. He would remake the world and at the same time conquer his own personal limitations.

programme.title: Tom Edison
programme.desc: Thomas Edison had no small ego and liked to promote himself as a lone inventor. But you cant take out 1100 patents in your lifetime by yourself. Instead, he built the first research and development laboratory, decades before anyone else in America understood the value of such a collaboration.

programme.title: Mark Twain
programme.desc: The secret of Twains success was that he echoed and reflected a longing of all sorts of people. Mark Twain became the most popular voice in America.

programme.title: Thomas Jefferson
programme.desc: Colonial America had no freedom of religion, the men who signed the Declaration of Independence hated each other. The reason you don’t know those facts? Thomas Jefferson.

programme.title: George Washington
programme.desc: He wasnt always the greatest strategist and tactician, and he actually made a lot of mistakes early on. But George Washington was a leader unlike any other.

programme.title: Eleanor Roosevelt
programme.desc: Known as the First Lady of the World, Eleanor Roosevelt was a leader in her own right and involved in numerous humanitarian causes throughout her life.

programme.title: Walt Disney
programme.desc: Explore the personal side of the man who brought animated characters to life, revolutionized entertainment, and saw the future as a magical place with many possibilities.

programme.title: The Wright Brothers: Bravery
programme.desc: Just over 100 years ago, a pair of brothers looked to the sky and changed the world. They designed, built and flew the most ridiculous of inventions.

programme.title: Sailing to the Stars
programme.desc: Solar sails, the latest in space travel technology, could one day help us reach nearby stars. Follow the exciting missions laying the ground towards a new form of space exploration.

programme.title: Transcontinental Railroad
programme.desc: The Americans who settled the west, those icons of freedom and independence, lived at the mercy of the railroad tycoons.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: The Cold War was won not by weapons of war, but blue jeans, silk stockings, and fast food. Just follow the money.

programme.title: Civil War
programme.desc: Why, as a teenager in New Jersey in the 1980s, was Peter Sagal taught the Southern myth of the Civil War? Slaves = money = power.

programme.title: Watergate
programme.desc: Like a burger and fries, Nixon and scandal have always gone together. But why did his men break into the Watergate office building? Why did Nixon crave personal wealth?

programme.title: JFK: Fact and Fable
programme.desc: Television made John Kennedy the ultimate celebrity during his presidency. However, the JFK we remember is the one his wife, Jackie, created after his death.

programme.title: Presidents In Crisis
programme.desc: Before they led America through national crises, Presidents Abraham Lincoln, Franklin Roosevelt and Lyndon Johnson were all transformed by personal trauma. Historian Doris Kearns Goodwin reveals the all too human men who became legends.

programme.title: Hack the Moon: Unsung Heroes of Apollo
programme.desc: The remarkable story of the engineers behind the revolutionary technologies developed for the Apollo missions.

programme.title: MIA: Hunt for a WWII Plane
programme.desc: Ex-CIA agent Ben Smith and a retired FBI officer journey through the Jungles of Burma in search of answers to a family mystery.

programme.title: John Doy and the Immortal 10
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Impossible Escapes: Civil War
programme.desc: John Doy is arrested along the Underground Railroad, but his friends are determined to set him free.

programme.title: Breaking out of Libby Prison
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Impossible Escapes: Civil War
programme.desc: A band of POWs held in the Confederate capital attempt the Civil War’s largest prison escape.

programme.title: Pauline Cushman: Tales of a Yankee Spy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Impossible Escapes: Civil War
programme.desc: When actress and Union spy Pauline Cushman is captured, her performance skills offer her a way out.

programme.title: Rebel Raid in Vermont
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Impossible Escapes: Civil War
programme.desc: Confederate raiders attack a small town in Vermont. A local posse tries to cut off their escape.

programme.title: Robert Smalls: Steamboat to Freedom
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Impossible Escapes: Civil War
programme.desc: Robert Smalls is enslaved, but he has the skills and the nerve to sail a rebel ship to freedom.

programme.title: Into the Rebel Swamp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Impossible Escapes: Civil War
programme.desc: Wallace Turnage was born a slave. He made multiple escape attempts. But on his sixth - and final - attempt, he endured a genuine odyssey.

programme.title: The Foundations of Home - Structure and Shelter
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The History of Home Narrated by Nick Offerman
programme.desc: The History of Home is a story that is ever-changing, constantly being renovated and built upon. As homes changed, so too did our lives.

programme.title: The Hall, The Kitchen, The Dining Room, The Living Room
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The History of Home Narrated by Nick Offerman
programme.desc: Now that weve reviewed the fundamentals of shelter - the past, present, and future of materials - its time to step over the threshold and find out who is home.

programme.title: The Second Story - Private Life
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The History of Home Narrated by Nick Offerman
programme.desc: In the final episode, The History of Home will focus on private life by exploring the history of three rooms; The study, the bedroom, and the bathroom.

programme.title: Monticello
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The History of Home Presents... Historys Greatest Homes
programme.desc: Welcome to one of the most important homes in American history. Thomas Jefferson’s Monticello. We’ll explore inside and out to find out more about this unique home.

programme.title: Hearst Castle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The History of Home Presents... Historys Greatest Homes
programme.desc: In this episode, we get an up-close and personal look as we pull back the curtain on the fascinating history behind one of America’s most iconic homes, Hearst Castle.

programme.title: Hampton Court Palace
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The History of Home Presents... Historys Greatest Homes
programme.desc: Take a journey back in history as we explore the fascinating story of Hampton Court Palace and the scandals of its most infamous resident, King Henry VIII.

programme.title: The Rich and The Royal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The History of Home Presents... Historys Greatest Homes
programme.desc: From the Rhode Island coastline to the Forests of France, what unites the rich and the royal is a love of a grand home.

programme.title: Once Were Warriors
programme.desc: Heken perheessa ei ole rauhallista hetkea. Jake Heke on vakivaltainen humalassa, toinen poika on liittynyt katujengiin ja toinen odottaa syytteita. Beth-aidilla ja lapsilla on edessaan vaikea mutta elintarkea paatos: jaada toivottomaan tilanteeseen tai rikkoa kahleensa. Kerran sotureita on palkittu perhedraama menneisyyden hyvaksymisesta ja tulevaisuuden luomisesta.

programme.title: Journeyman
programme.desc: Puolustettuaan titteliaan rankassa ottelussa, nyrkkeilyn keskisarjan maailmanmestari Matty Burton romahtaa. Matka kohti puhe-, liikunta- ja muistikyvyn palautumista tulee olemaan rankin hanen otteluistaan, mutta palkinto on tyon arvoista, kun hanen suhteensa vaimo Emmaan ja tytar Miaan on pelissa.
