programme.title: White Death
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Trail S1 - "White Death"
programme.desc: Snow, what the mountain men called white death, stops Laramy in his tracks. In addition, his trusty horse Seven has suffered a leg injury. Laramy must take care of Seven, battle through hunger, and survive the snowfall.

programme.title: Strakka Racing - Mercedes AMG GT3
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Strakka Racing - Mercedes AMG GT3"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Strakka Racing who are competing in a Mercedes AMG GT3 at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Garage 59 - McLaren 650S
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Garage 59 - McLaren 650S"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Garage 59 competing in a McLaren 650S at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race held at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Shelly
programme.desc: A neglected 1981 Porsche 911 SC is brought back to life and restored to its original factory specifications.

programme.title: Cabriolet
programme.desc: A ruined and rested family heirloom 1962 Mercedes Benz 220 SE Cabriolet gets a restoration modification with a new Mercedes engine and a new interior with heated seats.

programme.title: Episode Ten
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Ten"
programme.desc: Nik praises the 2021 Audi e-tron Sportback. Mike talks about the return of the coupe SUV with the Infiniti QX55. Nik tests the Lamborghini Huracan EVO and explores the 2021 hybrid Wrangler 4XE.

programme.title: Episode Eleven
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Eleven"
programme.desc: Nik explores the Mazda CX30 Turbo and Toyota 4Runner. He highlights the 2022 VW IDA and off-roads in the Hyundai Santa Cruz. Hopes are high for the Lexus LF-Z Concept Electric.

programme.title: This Roadrunner gives me a Hemi
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Graveyard Carz S7 - "This Roadrunner gives me a Hemi"
programme.desc: The 1 of a kind 1969 Hemi Roadrunner Convertible, is back on the lift. With the owner soon to arrive, the ghouls have to ramp up and get it finished.

programme.title: Judgement Day
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Graveyard Carz S7 - "Judgement Day"
programme.desc: Tony and Cindy DAgostino visit the Ghouls. Mark and Tony geek out over the 1970 Superbee 383 Magnum and the 1971 Plymouth Roadrunner.

programme.title: Never Ending Day
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Wardens S5 - "Never Ending Day"
programme.desc: The Wardens day starts early with an opportunity to capture a convicted game violator who has dodged the law for over 3 years. But just as one case closes another begins - forcing them to work late into the night.

programme.title: FMX Nomads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FMX Nomads S1 - "FMX Nomads"
programme.desc: Join Dan Whitby, Samson Eaton and Arran Powley for a day in the life of globetrotting freestyle motocross team, Bolddog.

programme.title: NARCOTRAFFIC POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Police Patrol S1 - "NARCOTRAFFIC POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: As one of the world’s top cocaine producers, Peru is a magnet for global drug cartels. To combat the trade at its source, the elite anti-narcotics unit Sinchi was formed—taking the fight deep into the heart of production zones.

programme.title: Slums
programme.desc: Since 1991, Mumbai’s population has doubled, with over half living in slums. Buenos Aires faces similar struggles, where 7.6% reside in shantytowns. Paramedics often can’t reach these areas and must rely on local volunteers.

programme.title: Brazil’s Pantanal
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Travel Quest S2 - "Brazil’s Pantanal"
programme.desc: There may be no place on earth so rich in wildlife as Brazil’s Pantanal. In this Quest, Bill is going to track some of the rainforest creatures he’s always wanted to see.

programme.title: Cultural Rwanda
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Travel Quest S2 - "Cultural Rwanda"
programme.desc: They say time heals all wounds, but can it heal the most horrific of all—genocide. On this Quest, Bill returns to Rwanda to see the post-war healing happening in this small, but globally significant country.

programme.title: Australia Top to Bottom
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Travel Quest S2 - "Australia Top to Bottom"
programme.desc: Australia is a giant country with diverse ecosystems that make it one of the most interesting in the world. This episode of Travel Quest explores the north and far south of this country…the world’s biggest “island”.

programme.title: Dyno Test
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Dyno Test"
programme.desc: The record attempt is only one week away and everything seems to be on track, until the results of a dyno test put a spanner in the works.

programme.title: Meet the Press
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Meet the Press"
programme.desc: The official press launch of The Flying Kestrel at legendary racetrack, Santa Pod. The Kestrel team is joined by Victor Riley of Riley Cars, and celebrity Rachel Riley.

programme.title: Record Day - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Record Day - Part 1"
programme.desc: The transformation is complete and it’s time for The Flying Kestrel to be put to the test.

programme.title: Morocco
programme.desc: A German MTB legend decides to build a van and travel all the way down to Morocco to explore and ride the great Atlas mountains.

programme.title: Record Day - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Record Day - Part 2"
programme.desc: The Flying Kestrel takes on the final records attempts, and the shocking results leave everyone reeling.

programme.title: Traffic
programme.desc: Thailand’s roads are among the deadliest in the world, with 24,000 deaths in 2016—73% of them motorcyclists. In Bangkok, paramedics remain constantly vigilant. Meanwhile, in Benin, daily fatal accidents keep Cotonou’s firefighters busy with medical evacuations.

programme.title: TOURIST POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Police Patrol S1 - "TOURIST POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: With one of the highest homicide rates in the world, Acapulco sees 104 murders per 100,000 people. In this deadly environment, a special anti-crime unit puts their lives on the line daily to keep the city from descending into chaos.

programme.title: Crushed By A Boulder - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Fight to Survive S3 - "Crushed By A Boulder - Part 2"
programme.desc: After his leg is crushed by a boulder, Gregg Hein is stranded on a high Sierra peak with an infected compound fracture. Knowing he won’t be reported missing for days, Gregg attempts to crawl off the mountain and rescue himself.

programme.title: Iraqi Sniper Attack
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Fight to Survive S3 - "Iraqi Sniper Attack"
programme.desc: On deployment in Anbar Province, Marine Corp Master Sergeant Buck Doyle throws himself in harms way to save a fallen comrade from an Iraqi sniper and becomes a target himself. This is a story of survival on and off the battlefield.

programme.title: Lightning Strike
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Fight to Survive S3 - "Lightning Strike"
programme.desc: A bass fishing trip goes horribly wrong when a bolt of lightning strikes their boat, leaving Seventeen-year-old Christian Neal burned and unconscious and his father Gabe blown into the water and paralyzed. It will take a miracle to save them.

programme.title: Without a Trace
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Without a Trace"
programme.desc: Tanalian Aviation pilots Joel Natwick and Josiah Freeman assist with a search and rescue for an experienced hiker deep in the winter wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Gone Awry
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Salvage Gone Awry"
programme.desc: Joel and Mark Barker tempt fate and fly into no mans land to find and salvage a white airplane in a snowy forest, and fight hypothermia along the way.

programme.title: Heaven at 5,000 Feet
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Heaven at 5,000 Feet"
programme.desc: Pilot Josiah Freeman takes a professional snowboarder Mark Barajas to the top of the Chugach Mountains for some hellacious heli-skiing.

programme.title: Exploration Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Exploration Camp"
programme.desc: Days pass, moose elusive since Day 11. Restless nights with lurking creatures. They find an abandoned trappers cabin, home to a huge grizzly.

programme.title: Prayer Point 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Prayer Point 2"
programme.desc: On the third day of river travel, the crew desperately seeks a hunting camp to lift morale and pursue the giant bull. Frustration mounts as the brothers confess uncertainty for the first time.

programme.title: King of the Tundra
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "King of the Tundra"
programme.desc: Casey downs a huge bull near the river. Another bull approaches, leading to a tense standoff across the river.

programme.title: Tokyo
programme.desc: Local Exploring in Tokyo is like nothing else. Josh and Lexi Limitless visit the crowded streets, a screaming Monster Cafe and an abandoned ‘Love Hotel’.

programme.title: Nikko
programme.desc: Epic Exploring: Going Local is back in Japan in Nikko as Cody, reunited with Sherman Mak, explores a derelict onsen and an amusement park called Western Village.

programme.title: Lifted
programme.desc: As their Alaska journey nears its end, Kaid and R.L. reflect on lifes priorities and lessons learned. Lifelong bonds are cemented as they prepare for extraction.

programme.title: The Crash
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "The Crash"
programme.desc: After driver Jon Webster crashes the Flying Kestrel at 148 mph, the team must work out what went wrong and have to decide if the dream of a land speed record is worth risking it all?

programme.title: Traffic
programme.desc: Thailand’s roads are among the deadliest in the world, with 24,000 deaths in 2016—73% of them motorcyclists. In Bangkok, paramedics remain constantly vigilant. Meanwhile, in Benin, daily fatal accidents keep Cotonou’s firefighters busy with medical evacuations.

programme.title: TOURIST POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Police Patrol S1 - "TOURIST POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: With one of the highest homicide rates in the world, Acapulco sees 104 murders per 100,000 people. In this deadly environment, a special anti-crime unit puts their lives on the line daily to keep the city from descending into chaos.

programme.title: Mercedes SL
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Mercedes SL"
programme.desc: Mat Watson tracks down one of the most desirable convertibles on the planet. The Mercedes SL Pagoda.

programme.title: American Car
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Find Me A Classic S1 - "American Car"
programme.desc: Mat Watson sets off to seek out a slice of Americana. A classic car from the USA.

programme.title: Volvo P1800
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Volvo P1800"
programme.desc: Mat Watson hunts throughout Europe for a classy Nordic coupe. The Volvo P1800.

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "New York"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie hits New York City in a four million dollar rare Lamborghini Centenario. Her quest is to track down the players in the underground drift driving scene and visit the exclusive Manhattan Motor Club.

programme.title: Day 1
programme.desc: Kevin travels to Switzerland and has 24 hours to go from Zurich to the Swiss mountains, while Jalou finds an exciting way to go from Cannes to Corsica.

programme.title: Day 2
programme.desc: Jalou has 24 hours to get from Barcelona to Tarragona where she conquers the Catalonian mountains with her mountain bike. Kevin tries to beat her in Slovenia.

programme.title: Copenhagen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Running the World S1 - "Copenhagen"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Copenhagen to meet up with a local free runner and undertake an epic run of Tivoli Gardens.

programme.title: London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Running the World S1 - "London"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to London where they are challenged to create a run in the Olympic Park.

programme.title: The Struggle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Trail S1 - "The Struggle"
programme.desc: Laramy remains stuck at Camp Hell Hole, nursing 7s leg, and struggling to survive in the freezing temperatures without food.

programme.title: On the Move
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Trail S1 - "On the Move"
programme.desc: Laramy and 7 leave camp Hell Hole and hit the trail again. They are headed for lower elevation in search of a more permanent place to call home.

programme.title: The Pro Drivers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "The Pro Drivers"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know the Pro Drivers competing at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race held at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Episode Twelve
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Twelve"
programme.desc: Nik praises the 2021 Lincoln Aviator GT Hybrid. Mike showcases the 2021 Audi Q5. Nik explains Jeeps luxury transformation of the Wagoneer. He tests the hands-free drive of the 2022 Chevy Bolt SUV.

programme.title: The Rebuild
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "The Rebuild"
programme.desc: The Flying Kestrel team regroup at Jon’s workshop as he shows them his new groundbreaking ideas to rebuild the car to give them the best chance at breaking a land speed record.

programme.title: The 3.5
programme.desc: A rare 1971 Mercedes Benz 280 SE 3.5 Coupe gets restored to its original specifications.

programme.title: Pinky
programme.desc: A pink, air-cooled, 1973 Porsche 911 RS is upgraded with a custom built engine, new paint, and new wheels and tires.

programme.title: Benzilla
programme.desc: A slow and outdated 1959 Mercedes Benz 180 D is modified with a bargain budget to include new wheels and an American V8 muscle motor.

programme.title: Cuda ‘Tat
programme.desc: Mark and Allysa decode the broadcast sheet for a 1970 Challenger. Will breaks a part on the Cuda and Mark painstakingly examines his paint job.

programme.title: What We Do for a Buck
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Graveyard Carz S7 - "What We Do for a Buck"
programme.desc: Its time for some resto-lovin on Bucks 71 Challenger R/T. Allysa helps Dave install the brake lines, work on the overhead console and install the gas tank.

programme.title: Daytona vs. Hellcat
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Graveyard Carz S7 - "Daytona vs. Hellcat"
programme.desc: Mark and the Ghouls compare a 1969 Daytona with a 2016 Hellcat. They take them for a drive to the weigh station and for a side by side on the dyno.

programme.title: Angry Like a Moose
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Wardens S5 - "Angry Like a Moose"
programme.desc: Region 4 Wardens are called in to round up a 1000 pound bully. But this youngster is not leaving the safety of his home. The Wardens turn to drastic measures to secure the situation.

programme.title: River Rescue
programme.desc: Region 1 Wardens come across a squatter on public land that leaves them speechless. And Region 5 Wardens are on high alert at the annual Yellowstone River Boat Float.

programme.title: Failure To Tag
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Wardens S5 - "Failure To Tag"
programme.desc: Birds, bucks and missing licenses. This week the Wardens watch a clear violation take place in Region 5. Property lines are crossed in pursuit of upland game and a license check comes up empty.

programme.title: Norway
programme.desc: Thom Hunt challenges himself to fish for Cod in picturesque Norway in freezing conditions.

programme.title: Long Beach California
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Close Proximity S1 - "Long Beach California"
programme.desc: Matt Field and his and his solid team of experts head down to Long Beach, California to begin the Formula Drift Championship series.

programme.title: Atlanta
programme.desc: Coming off a good start to the Formula Drift Tour, Matt Field and his crew prep, pack, and fly to Atlanta for next stop of the Formula Drift championship.

programme.title: Morgan Hill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Close Proximity S1 - "Morgan Hill"
programme.desc: After a loss against Formula Drift newcomer Faruk Kugay in Atlanta, Matt is back in Morgan Hill, cleaning up the Drift Cave before heading to Orlando.

programme.title: Spain
programme.desc: We meet with a Spanish MTB pro rider who decided to create his own company in order to build the most exclusive and unique carbon bikes.

programme.title: Bali
programme.desc: We travel to Bali - Indonesia to meet an MTB pro rider who decided to start a new life dividing his time between surfing and riding active volcanos.

programme.title: New Zealand
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 MTB Heroes S3 - "New Zealand"
programme.desc: We meet one of the most famous MTB photographers in New Zealand and follow him during the biggest MTB competition in Rotorua.

programme.title: Mountain Lion Attack
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Fight to Survive S3 - "Mountain Lion Attack"
programme.desc: Marine Anne Hjelle was mountain biking when she was ripped off her bike by a mountain lion. Anne fought back even as the big cat shredded her face in its jaws. Surviving the attack was only the beginning of Anne’s incredible fight to survive.

programme.title: Soul Of A Survivor
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Fight to Survive S3 - "Soul Of A Survivor"
programme.desc: Craig DeMartino examines the stories of other survivors he’s met across the season. Their survival stories are all different, but Craig discovers that these survivors share more in common than you might think.

programme.title: Hanging by a Thread
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Hanging by a Thread"
programme.desc: Tanalian Aviation bush pilots Joel and Josiah earn their keep slinging a stranded snow machine.

programme.title: Into the Deep
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Into the Deep"
programme.desc: The bush pilots have to use all their skills - scuba diving, underwater rigging and expert flying - to try and salvage a de Havilland Beaver wing at the bottom of the 6 Mile Lake.

programme.title: Flying High
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Flying High"
programme.desc: The Tanalian bush pilots transport extreme paragliders to Moose Creek, in the Talkeetna Range, for a once-in-a-lifetime airbone experience.

programme.title: The Day After
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "The Day After"
programme.desc: On the heels of killing a giant bull, Chris and Casey get the 1500 pound moose quartered just before darkness falls and build a meat cache to preserve food rations for the rest of the journey.

programme.title: Return Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Return Home"
programme.desc: Caseys bull speeds downstream, out of sight. Anticipation rises as they round the bend. Chris spots it washed up near white water on a gravel flat.

programme.title: Hell has a Name
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Hell has a Name"
programme.desc: The journeys to Base Camp and to sheep camp are highlighted.

programme.title: Estonia / Vietnam
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Epic Exploring S1 - "Estonia / Vietnam"
programme.desc: In this episode, Josh travels to Tallinn in Estonia with urban explorer Steve Duncan where they explore Patarei Prison. Meanwhile, Cody is in Vietnam with his friend Sherman Mak and travels to Pan Thiet in search of abandoned amusement park Soui Cat.

programme.title: Empty Handed
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers put boots to ground as their journey through Alaska begins. Armed with nothing but a couple Glock 20s, the brothers immediately begin their search for their first supply-yielding cache.

programme.title: Long Days, Cold Nights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Dropped S1 - "Long Days, Cold Nights"
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers awaken to a frozen tundra. With over 8 miles to cover and no oars, the brothers are forced to trudge their way through shallow water and barren earth as they head downstream in search of they second cache.

programme.title: Sniper Attack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Survival Science S1 - "Sniper Attack"
programme.desc: Military snipers are trained in a variety of skills: detection, stalking, camouflage, infiltration, special reconnaissance and target acquisition. Bottom line, a ton of cool shooting and science for Nick and Laura to explore!

programme.title: Surviving a Lightning Strike
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving a Lightning Strike"
programme.desc: Laura and Nick travel to a state-of-the-art Direct Effects Lightning Test Lab. With some “explosive” experiments, they’ll determine the power lightning and how it behaves? And they’ll find out how can hunters and fishermen best protect themselves?

programme.title: Boars and Prehistoric Fish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Boars and Prehistoric Fish"
programme.desc: Mario returns to his homeland in Australia to help a friend out, but drama strikes and Mario finds himself in crocodile infested water plucking fish out with his bare hands.All these delicious bush treats are prepared in a termite oven made by Mario.

programme.title: Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. From the serene to the seedy, she combs through metro Manila discovering the food; this culinary spectrum includes bouncing around trying the popular fast food joints, meeting the local experts such as blogger Cheryl Tiu, a taste of history at the worlds oldest Chinatown, an unexpected dancing session at the Spanish haunts of Manila, to rubbing shoulders with the elite Chefs of the city. All in a quest to answer just why Filipino cuisine is unheard of!

programme.title: Mauritius Part 1
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Mauritius Part 1"
programme.desc: East Africa beckons and Sashi is answering the call. Sashi is bouncing around the island nation to discover its culinary curiosities; from streetfood to haute cuisine, and everything else in between!

programme.title: Mauritius Part 2
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Mauritius Part 2"
programme.desc: East Africa beckons and Sashi is answering the call. Sashi is bouncing around the island nation to discover its culinary curiosities; from streetfood to haute cuisine, and everything else in between!

programme.title: Lisbon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Lisbon"
programme.desc: Two street artists are fusing their styles together in one of the worlds finest cities, Lisbon.The challenge is left hanging by a thread when disaster strikes.

programme.title: London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Street Art Challenge S1 - "London"
programme.desc: Two legendary street artists team up in London for the ultimate Street Art Challenge. Things get out of hand between the two as it turns into a street fight.

programme.title: The Tropic Cape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Africa From Cape to Kruger S1 - "The Tropic Cape"
programme.desc: Stage four of his journey takes Andreas Keiling from ocean to mountain, from swamp to sand dune, as he makes his way to a spectacular Lakeland water park. His day starts with a nerve wracking dip in the ocean to swim with a school of

programme.title: The Cape Bush
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Africa From Cape to Kruger S1 - "The Cape Bush"
programme.desc: During the final stage of his journey, Andreas visits the legendary Kruger National Park, hoping for a close encounter with South Africa’s legendary predators. Under the watchful eye of an experienced bushman he tracks a herd of Cape buffalo.

programme.title: Somalisa Expeditions Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Somalisa Expeditions Camp"
programme.desc: Upon arrival in Zimbabwe, Kristina Guberman travels to Hwange National Park - renowned for it’s impressive elephant herds. She learns about these gentle giants, encounters cheetah on foot and chances upon a cheetah hunt with her guide, David.

programme.title: Mana Pools and Chitake Spring
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Mana Pools and Chitake Spring"
programme.desc: Kristina travels to the Mana Pools and Chitake Springs with guide Craig van Zyl. They come across mating lions, wild dogs, have close encounters with bull elephants, and canoe just meters away from imposing hippos and crocodiles on the Zambezi River.

programme.title: Florence and Brittany
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Travel in Style S3 - "Florence and Brittany"
programme.desc: Known as the birthplace of the renaissance, we visit Florence, home to Michael Angelo’s David and one of the oldest silk factories in the world. Then it’s off to France for a gastronomic tour of Brittany.

programme.title: London City and Miami
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Travel in Style S4 - "London City and Miami"
programme.desc: From one amazing city to another, London and Miami prove to be both cool and contemporary. This episode shows us what these hotspots have to offer for luxury holidaymakers.

programme.title: Finolhu and Banff
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Travel in Style S4 - "Finolhu and Banff"
programme.desc: From the Maldives to Canada, this episode explores the very best on offer for a sunny get away on a resort, to a snowy retreat in the mountains.

programme.title: Latvia - Gauja National Park
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Wonders Of... S1 - "Latvia - Gauja National Park"
programme.desc: One of three Baltic states, Latvia’s rich forest holds the magic of Gauja National Park where Ashley rafts, canoes, treks, rides and bungees through the largest National Park in the country.

programme.title: Latvia - Riga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Wonders Of... S1 - "Latvia - Riga"
programme.desc: Ashley falls in love with the charm of Latvia’s capital city, Riga. The Soviet times left an abandoned history in Karosta and Ashley experiences the times as a prisoner, and escapes to the

programme.title: Switzerland - Jungfrau
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Wonders Of... S1 - "Switzerland - Jungfrau"
programme.desc: From early morning cheese making to yodeling through the Alps, Ashley goes back to her Swiss roots in the mountains. The sweetness and secret recipe to their most prestigious chocolate is revealed.

programme.title: Barcelona and London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Barcelona and London"
programme.desc: If you’re a budding architect or simply an admirer of beautiful buildings this episode takes in some of best in Europe from London and Barcelona.

programme.title: Uga Bay, Sri Lanka and Istanbul
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Uga Bay, Sri Lanka and Istanbul"
programme.desc: This episode covers fine dining in some of the most peculiar settings at the beautiful beach resort of Uga Bay in Sri Lanka then The Luxury Travel Show flies to Istanbul, the Turkish city where Europe and Asia meet.

programme.title: Grand Cayman and Toledo
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Grand Cayman and Toledo"
programme.desc: From the beautiful Hell on earth, a small town in the Grand Cayman islands, to the equally hot planes of Toledo for a safari, Spanish style.

programme.title: Jeans
programme.desc: The definition of a wardrobe staple, denim is as diverse as the people who wear it. Kyle Ng travels to Japan to see how to make the worlds best jeans and to Los Angeles, California, United States to see the past and future of this fashion icon.

programme.title: T-Shirt
programme.desc: Kyle Ng travels the USA to explore the past and present of the T-shirt. He sees new silhouettes, walks the memory lane of 1990s rap tees, and tie dyes with a master.

programme.title: Sneakers
programme.desc: Kyle Ng goes to Japan where he visits Asics, talks to Freehand Profit about his process for making sneaker masks, and explores the history of the world’s most-loved punk rock skater shoe with Steve Caballero.

programme.title: Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Great Way S1 - "Peru"
programme.desc: Raúl and Alba are a Spanish young couple which love for trekking and hiking motivated them to travel around the world to walk along four of the most known trails.

programme.title: Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Great Way S1 - "Japan"
programme.desc: Raúl and Alba are a Spanish young couple which love for trekking and hiking motivated them to travel around the world to walk along four of the most known trails.

programme.title: Spain
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Great Way S1 - "Spain"
programme.desc: Raúl and Alba are a Spanish young couple which love for trekking and hiking motivated them to travel around the world to walk along four of the most known trails.

programme.title: Algarve V Istanbul
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Jet Set S1 - "Algarve V Istanbul"
programme.desc: Portugal’s Algarve has long been a favorite holiday destination in Europe. Gill takes a boat ride along the regions famous sea cave coastline. While Richard enjoys a tour around the Turkish city of Istanbul, and visits the jewel in the cities crown.

programme.title: Toledo Spain V Provo (Turks and Caicos)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Jet Set S1 - "Toledo Spain V Provo (Turks and Caicos)"
programme.desc: Gill throws everything she’s got into this episode in her Spanish safari from the countryside town of Toledo, seventy kilometers south of Madrid. Richard visits the tiny island of Providenciales, part of the Turks and Caicos Islands in the Caribbean.

programme.title: Lisbon V Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Jet Set S1 - "Lisbon V Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos)"
programme.desc: In the penultimate episode Richard remains in the Turks and Caicos Islands, only this time he’s visiting the exclusive island resort of Parrot Cay. While Gill’s combining a city and beach break in the Portuguese capital of Lisbon.

programme.title: Darwin, Phuket
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 A Taste of Travel S2 - "Darwin, Phuket"
programme.desc: David Reyne visits Darwin and the amazing Litchfield National Park, and Scotty takes the road less travelled on an ATV tour of Phuket, before a bit of go-karting on Queenland’s Sunshine Coast.

programme.title: East Timor
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 A Taste of Travel S2 - "East Timor"
programme.desc: Dave Reyne explores the capitol of East Timor’s Dili, and Alana enjoy a serenade on the river

programme.title: Bangkok
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 A Taste of Travel S2 - "Bangkok"
programme.desc: Alana finds a unique way to explore Budapest and Scotty enjoys a food crawl through Bangkok.

programme.title: Malaysia and L.A.
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Travel in Style S4 - "Malaysia and L.A."
programme.desc: From Asia to America, we explore the different cultures of Malaysia and Los Angeles, and the benefits of visiting both. One teaches us to relax, while the other encourages us to go all out!

programme.title: Singapore and Toronto
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Travel in Style S4 - "Singapore and Toronto"
programme.desc: Singapore mixes the east and the west, while Toronto is a well-established major city in Canada. While both differ in many ways, you can be sure that either destination will be a trip to remember.

programme.title: Marrakech and New York
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Travel in Style S4 - "Marrakech and New York"
programme.desc: We explore two cities that have beautiful skylines but in two separate parts of the world. Marrakech and New York are both stylish, while representing their part of the world, whether it be Africa or the United States.

programme.title: Switzerland - Matterhorn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Wonders Of... S1 - "Switzerland - Matterhorn"
programme.desc: Ashley trains to climb the 6th most dangerous mountain in the world, the Matterhorn. Celebrating the 150 anniversary of the first climb by Edward Whymper, find out if Ashley makes it to the pinnacle.

programme.title: Switzerland - Secrets of Switzerland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Wonders Of... S1 - "Switzerland - Secrets of Switzerland"
programme.desc: Explore by bus, train, railway and cogwheel the secret towns of Switzerland deep within in the Alps. Ashley explores the Swiss Travel System and explores the history, while capturing some of the most beautiful views in the world.

programme.title: Philippines
programme.desc: On Wonders of Philippines, there’s no better place to start than the capital city of Manila. Full of history and a great jump off point to the islands, this inspiring city can’t be missed.

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 A Simple Path S3 - "New York"
programme.desc: Yann Horowitz delves into NYCs skate scene, visiting shops, meeting legends, and exploring iconic spots. He highlights skateboardings community and inclusivity, expressing affection for the city and the connections forged through his passion.

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 A Simple Path S3 - "Brooklyn"
programme.desc: Yann Horowitz skateboards with the KCDC skateboarding community in Brooklyn. Where he explores gaming, art and grilling with Crossy, Natalie, Jacob, Eddie and Nate, culminating in a joyful skate event showcasing community, inclusivity and fun.

programme.title: Aurelie Gonin
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Capturing Winter S1 - "Aurelie Gonin"
programme.desc: Aurelie Gonin is one of the few women working in winter action sports filmmaking. Over the years she gathered expertise in every aspect of her field. We join as she directs an elite ski and snowboarding qualification event of the Freeride World Tour.

programme.title: Berlin
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx journeys Berlin, one of the worlds undisputed techno capitals, and discovers the sound of freedom buried in its history.

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.desc: DJ-producer Carly Foxx travels to the clubbing capital of the world to inspire her music track and discovers Ibiza’s alternative spiritual side.

programme.title: Maui
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Maui"
programme.desc: Tyler Larronde beats the odds to execute a seamless barrel at the legendary big wave known as Mavericks.

programme.title: Family Values
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Family Values"
programme.desc: A new generation of female chargers band together to compete in a unique big wave surfing ‘expression session’ on the north shore of Oahu.

programme.title: Marriage Highs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Marriage Highs"
programme.desc: Tayler and Jason reconnect during a romantic stay in Lake Tahoe, but Jason struggles keeping his cool while off roading the Rubicon Trail. Are Jasons high expectations too? And will these expectations shut them down on their next climb, Mt Whitney?

programme.title: Alpenglow
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Alpenglow"
programme.desc: Jason and Tayler attempt to summit the highest peak in the continental US, Mt Whitney. However, during their time on ascent they run into some unexpected surprises that leave this mountain attempt one they will never forget.

programme.title: One More Round
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Love On The Rocks S1 - "One More Round"
programme.desc: A relaxing trip to Orcas Island takes a turn for the worst when plans begin to fall through; including the ferry ride back to the mainland. This mishap may leave them stranded for longer than expected, putting their final summit attempt at risk.

programme.title: Ancient forests of Tsitsikamma
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Ancient forests of Tsitsikamma"
programme.desc: Xander takes full advantage of the opportunities given to him by experiencing all that Tsitsikamma has to offer, whether that be bungee jumping, quad biking, or visiting a 60’s diner.

programme.title: The Animals of Oudtshoorn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Animals of Oudtshoorn"
programme.desc: Xander starts his day by receiving a surprising phone call from Adam before heading to Chandelier Game Lodge to visit Africa’s most exquisite animals.

programme.title: Creations of Prins Albert
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Creations of Prins Albert"
programme.desc: Despite unforeseen travel complications, Xander travels through a picturesque mountain pass to Prince Albert to enjoy the olive farms and other specialties the town has to offer.

programme.title: Right As Rain
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "Right As Rain"
programme.desc: On the building site, Mark is doing some minor interior decorating in the bathrooms. Lyndal and Amanda interview possible lodge staff. Meanwhile Bruce is in the kitchen trying to make his version of the South African dish called bobotie.

programme.title: The Big Reveal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "The Big Reveal"
programme.desc: Amanda runs around and fixes the last few odds and ends of the rooms. Bruce is adding the finishing touches to the menu he has been working on while he has been in Zimbabwe. Finally it is the time to welcome to the first guests to the lodge.

programme.title: Donsol, Philippines
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Donsol, Philippines"
programme.desc: Disaster and triumph set this show apart. The brothers start out with a near death boat disaster in the southern Philippine Sea but bounce back and end up attaining their goal of reaching Donsol village, the whale shark capitol of the world.

programme.title: Ryozenji Temple Shikoku, Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Ryozenji Temple Shikoku, Japan"
programme.desc: In this episode the brothers shun the more famous areas, Tokyo and Kyoto, and head to the isolated, ancient island of Shikoku. Their route is the ancient 88 Temple Zen pilgrimage circuit.

programme.title: Cape Breton Island, Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Cape Breton Island, Canada"
programme.desc: By pick-up truck, the brothers route is the culturally and geographically rich island of Cape Breton and the Cabot Trail. Lobster fishing, hooking, moose sightings, Bingo, Scottish ceilidhs, Mikmaq drum session, its all happening in this episode.

programme.title: Zagreb
programme.desc: Epic Exploring: Going Local visits Zagreb, Croatia. Cody fires a canon from the old tower, explores a never finished University Hospital and a political school.

programme.title: Barentsburg
programme.desc: Local Exploring on the edge of the world as Josh is on the artic Svalbard archipelago to explore in and around Barentsburg and the Arctic Ocean.

programme.title: Tirana
programme.desc: From Tirana, capital of old Soviet satellite Albania, Josh starts another local adventure filled with bunkers, a hidden hospital and diving in a pirate’s cave.

programme.title: Pig
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Pig"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Thailand with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Salt Flats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Roads End S1 - "Salt Flats"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave are continuing on through the stunning scenery of Laguna Brava towards Corona del Inca. That’s not all they’ve got in store though.

programme.title: Abandoned Village
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Roads End S1 - "Abandoned Village"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave embrace their adventurous sides when they abandon the plan to take the safe route and instead take on what could be their most challenging riding.

programme.title: South Pacific Paradise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "South Pacific Paradise"
programme.desc: In this episode of Travels With the Bondi Vet, Chris visits a city with more pets than children, experiences a 3-hour holiday in this south pacific paradise and goes on a 600 kilometer journey in the Australian outback to deliver some mail.

programme.title: Australian Islands and Abu Dhabi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "Australian Islands and Abu Dhabi"
programme.desc: In this episode of Travels with the Bondi Vet, Chris finds an Australian island with some unusual locals, finds out how fast he can go in futuristic Abu Dhabi, tags along on an extreme four wheel drive day trip and finds out why the Color Run is taking over the world!

programme.title: Borneo
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Borneo"
programme.desc: Chris travels to the stunning rainforests of Borneo, where he encounters endangered Orangutans and the extremely rare pygmy elephant.

programme.title: The Rockies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "The Rockies"
programme.desc: Chris sets out to learn about Canadian Wolf dogs, takes a trip on the world famous Rocky Mountaineer, and strikes out in search of black bears.

programme.title: Adelaide and Brisbane
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Adelaide and Brisbane"
programme.desc: Chris encounters knife jugglers, hula-hoopers, and giant pandas, takes an oyster challenge and tests his mettle against the world’s hottest burger!

programme.title: The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein"
programme.desc: With one final trip ahead of them, Xander and his crew make their way from the scorching desert of Lindbergh to the haunted ghost town of Matjiesfontein.

programme.title: Blueprints
programme.desc: Mark and Amanda show Lyndal and Bruce around the new building site and they explain their plans for the lodge. Building on the lodge site has started and seems to be progressing smoothly.

programme.title: Furnishings
programme.desc: Lyndal and Bruce discuss the Lodge’s dishes and menu. Lyndal and Amanda meet some baboons and their babies alongside the road on the way to see the famous Baobab tree. Bruce visits the local butcher to see what meats are on offer for the lodge.

programme.title: From On High
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "From On High"
programme.desc: Bruce is still working on the cow’s head meat, making biltong from pieces and hanging it up and the rest gets put into the stew. Ant picks up a problem with the leadwood tree; it has been cemented in the wrong place and needs to be moved.

programme.title: Luderitz
programme.desc: Epic Exploring is going local again as Cody adventures in Luderitz, Namibia going off the beaten path, through the desert and on to the ghost town of Pamona.

programme.title: Tallinn
programme.desc: Josh Yozura goes off the beaten path in Tallinn for some local urban exploring in an old Soviet theatre and a prison hidden underneath the ice of a quarry lake.

programme.title: Australian Islands and Abu Dhabi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "Australian Islands and Abu Dhabi"
programme.desc: In this episode of Travels with the Bondi Vet, Chris finds an Australian island with some unusual locals, finds out how fast he can go in futuristic Abu Dhabi, tags along on an extreme four wheel drive day trip and finds out why the Color Run is taking over the world!

programme.title: Borneo
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Borneo"
programme.desc: Chris travels to the stunning rainforests of Borneo, where he encounters endangered Orangutans and the extremely rare pygmy elephant.

programme.title: The Rockies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "The Rockies"
programme.desc: Chris sets out to learn about Canadian Wolf dogs, takes a trip on the world famous Rocky Mountaineer, and strikes out in search of black bears.

programme.title: Adelaide and Brisbane
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Adelaide and Brisbane"
programme.desc: Chris encounters knife jugglers, hula-hoopers, and giant pandas, takes an oyster challenge and tests his mettle against the world’s hottest burger!

programme.title: Day 1
programme.desc: Kevin travels to Switzerland and has 24 hours to go from Zurich to the Swiss mountains, while Jalou finds an exciting way to go from Cannes to Corsica.

programme.title: Goma, Congo
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Goma, Congo"
programme.desc: Bboy Junior is going back where he was born, The Democratic Republic of Congo. World champion Shigekix will join him, visiting Africa for the first time. Together they will explore the dance culture in the city of Goma.

programme.title: Sao Paulo, Brazil
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Sao Paulo, Brazil"
programme.desc: Russian Bgirl Kastet is visiting Sao Paulo, the home of Bboy Neguin. Together they will explore the dance, breaking and hip hop culture in the streets of Sao Paulo. Meeting up with legends and learning Capoeira, Jiu Jitsu and Passinho.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivoksesta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Uusi kaivoskausi on taynna ikavia yllatyksia, mutta epatodennakoinen tapahtuma pelastaa tilanteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh on kyllastynyt tyoskentelemaan isalleen, joten han perustaa oman kuorma-autoyrityksensa uudella rekalla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Armeijan kuorma-auto hajoaa julmalla tiella kaivokselle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Garon ja Josh menettavat Six packin hallinnan mutaisilla teilla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Justin lentaa paikalle uuden vaijerisahan kanssa, mutta menettaa malttinsa yrittaessaan asentaa sita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia tuo paikalle ison porauskaluston, ja hanella on vain nelja paivaa aikaa loytaa paras jadepaikka, mutta han ja Robin eivat osaa paattaa, mista etsia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehet ottavat yhteen, kun he loppukauden kiireet pakottavat heidat tyoskentelemaan kahdessa kaivoksessa yhta aikaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Claudia ja Robini etsivat jadea poraamalla tuloksetta, edes yhtion geologit eivat paase yksimielisyyteen suunnitelmasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada raskaan kaluston vuorelle ennen kuin tulvivat joet katkaisevat paasyn kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Ilmassa on jannitetta, kun miehisto yrittaa saada raskasta kalustoa mutaiselle, lohkareiden peittamalle 120 kilometrin pituiselle polulle perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksen vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
