programme.desc: Toting his guitar, an inmate serenades the officers. One man protests his arrest and states that having cocaine is not a crime. A man claims to be an Iraqi War Veteran and challenges his detainment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman finds herself in jail after telling police she was frightened by a monkey mask. An intoxicate man feels an officer is very special. During a search, an officer finds contraband in a pack of cigarettes that has big consequences to an inmate. A young man says his mom tried to pepper spray him over his brother’s drug use while officers discover the truth to his arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A passenger allegedly attacked a cabdriver. A woman describes assaulting her boyfriend with hot food, and a mother is arrested for leaving her kids in a car while gambling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After cutting her head, a woman bites and kicks deputies. To investigate potential hidden meanings, a man’s tattoos are examined. A confused man is found with illegal mushrooms at a bus stop.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Sunshine on a Cloudy Day
programme.desc: A woman who says she’s called “Sunshine” has less than a sunny disposition. A man ditches a halfway house for jail to get his life in order. A career criminal shows no regret for his “thug life.” Tense moments in Booking as officers and medical staff try to save a young man from a drug overdose.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man claims to be connected to the occupy Wall Street movement. Officers struggle with a combative man, and a tearful candy thief is taken into custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman stalking David Copperfield is arrested. An inebriated inmate voices her displeasure with the guards, and a man nabbed for driving under the influence of prescription drugs howls for his dog.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E17 Gone to the Dogs
programme.desc: Officers find hidden drugs on a burglary suspect during a pat down that leads to a tense confrontation. A beer sets off a fight between a mom and her daughter causing one family member to end up in jail. A rare event takes place in the county jail - a woman arrested for a warrant is in a good mood. Punching a pit bull while drunk lands in man in jail where he comes face to face with a childhood hero.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A ladies man smuggles womens underwear into jail. A woman arrested at a traffic accident is incredulous to discover that smoking marijuana while driving is against the law. A young man charged with a DUI tells guards he fears he may become pregnant behind bars.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman is placed in a restraint chair. A troubled woman with a drug addiction is brought in on prostitution charges. One man is taken to a sobering cell to sleep off his intoxication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An agitated man is overly concerned about his 30K watch. cries when he has blood drawn. An inebriated woman threatens her arresting officers with bodily harm, and a woman has no recollection of her arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Headbutts and aggression abound during a jail fight. A young man is arrested after stealing $1,500 worth of hats. Officers discover a suicidal inmate who’s no longer taking his medication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A homeless man punches a singing transient over a racist comment. An assailant hits a sleeping man with a brick over a money dispute. A sobbing young man insists he was falsely arrested. A bar fight sends a UFC fighter to the hospital and the bartender who slugged him to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a belligerent woman is restrained. In Portland, OR a repeat offender is placed in isolation for unruly behavior. In Las Vegas, NV a man opens up about how his friends and family feel about him in a holding cell. In Spokane, WA a man is jailed in an attempt to steal coffee for his friends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Im Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A fight involving female detainees breaks out after one woman accuses the other of staring at her. A man is arrested for shattering the hotel glass door as a result of a fight. An old crooner believes that rap stars are going to bail him out of jail. Handcuffs don’t stop a woman from trying to flirt with an officer.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an intoxicated man is strapped to a restraining chair. In Portland, OR a seemingly gracious man is arrested for assault. In Spokane, WA a homeless man is brought in for assault. In Salt Lake City, UT a frequent visitor is brought in for threating the security staff at a local bar with a firearm.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in womens lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT an inebriated man gets aggressive and questions why hes in custody. In Sarasota, FL a couple are taken in for assaulting a bartender. In Portland, OR a man is placed in custody for harassing movie theater security guards. In Las Vegas, NV a chauffeur is placed in custody for amassing a number of of moving violations.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is placed in isolation after disparaging other inmates. Alarms blare while a fight erupts in the shower room among inmates. A man booked into jail is revealed to have a 20-year arrest record.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is charged with possession of a controlled substance. A woman denies assaulting her husband, and two aggressive cousins threaten police and end up in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man fresh out of prison tries to prove how tough he is. A drunk woman rages against everyone in her path. A couple’s wedding plans are ruined after officers find their stash of meth, and an arrest leaves an elderly gentleman singing the blues after being processed for a possession charge.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A jail chaplain counsels a sad inmate. An intoxicated woman demands to talk to the Canadian Embassy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Uncooperative and agitated, a man complains officers are violating his rights. A “443” call is issued, and a deputy desperately needs help. Outside the cell block, there’s knockouts and bloody noses.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman fights arrest resulting in a trip to the isolation chamber. One inmate calls 911 within jail walls causing confusion. Later, officers run to the rescue when a man passes out.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man tests officers patience. A woman tries to deceive police with multiple identities. A one-legged biker shows off his balancing skills to officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate fails to impress the staff with his witticisms. A woman boasts about excelling at her DUI field test, and a man learns his wreckless driving has resulted in the death of a man.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A transient man tries to resist the officers in booking then serenades them with a song. A difficult inmate blames his behavior on various medical conditions, and a woman claims to be Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a combative inmate provokes the use of pepper spray. In Sarasota, FL a drunk woman is uncooperative during processing. In Spokane, WA a man attempts to flip off the camera while taking his mug-shot.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A prisoner refuses to exit his cell prompting an elaborate extraction. A man begins singing in response to his arrest. During a severe alcohol withdrawal, an inmate repeatedly escapes his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Toting his guitar, an inmate serenades the officers. One man protests his arrest and states that having cocaine is not a crime. A man claims to be an Iraqi War Veteran and challenges his detainment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A hysterical woman is transferred to an isolation cell. A woman shows her undying LA pride to the arresting officers. A young woman is put under observation for threatening harm to herself.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A testy man is sent to the isolation cell to "cool off." A teary-eyed young man maintains his innocence. An inmate may have ingested contraband to avoid possession charges.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought into the detention center hogtied. A disruptive teen is sent to a holding cell. Casino valets tip the authorities about an intoxicated woman leaving behind the wheel.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV a man who insists he paid for a speeding ticket becomes so incensed that he is placed in a restraining chair. In Sarasota, FL a belligerent man accuses officers of touching him inappropriately. In Portland, OR officers help a young mother and her kids.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an honest offender turns himself in. Officers arrest an underage woman who admits to driving under the influence. A woman is taken into custody after harming herself with a pair of scissors

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR a man in custody accuses officers of being involved in the 1992 event at Ruby Ridge. In Sarasota, FL a drunk man falls off his bike and purports to have been hit by a car. In Las Vegas, LV a daring inmate attempts to make a break for it while the supervising officers attend to a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Im Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man admits to urinating in public. A couple spends their date night in jail after being over served, and a DUI suspect passes out during booking.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: Anna on jumissa. Han on melkein 30, mutta asuu aitinsa puutarhavajassa, ei juttele juuri kenenkaan kanssa ja viettaa aikansa tekemalla lyhytelokuvia, joissa nayttelevat hanen peukalonsa. Jotakin puuttuu, ja eristyneisyys nayttaa olevan Annan tapa kasitella suurta surua. Mutta kun Anna sattumalta ystavystyy kahdeksanvuotiaan cowboyn kanssa, han alkaa pikkuhiljaa avautua. Adult Life Skills on Rachel Tunnardin ensimmainen pitka elokuva, joka kertoo yhta lailla surullisen kuin hauskankin tarinan kuolemasta ja sen kanssa elamisesta. Broadchurch-tahti Jodie Whittaker tulkitsee sulkeutuneen Annaan roolin kauniisti ja humoristisesti.

programme.title: Pete Smalls Is Dead
programme.desc: Hollywoodin taakseen jattanyt kasikirjoittaja joutuu palaamaan unelmien kaupunkiin ohjaajaystavansa kuoltua.

programme.title: 21 and Over
programme.desc: Jeff Chang on yliopiston priimus ja koko perheen suuri toivo. Hanen parhaat kaverinsapolkaisevat yllattaen pystyyn 21-vuotissynttarit, joten Jeffin pitaa tehda valinta.Meneeko han pirteana laaketieteellisen paasykokeeseen? Heittaytyyko han villiinyohon, joka sisaltaa drinkkeja, sylitanssia, harkaratsastusta, bodyshotteja, golfkarrykisan, katolta hyppimista, oksentamista, pukeutumista naiseksi, tappelua, biletyttoja ja ajamista kannissa? Kumman itse valitsisit?

programme.title: Neighbor for sale
programme.desc: Koskettavassa komediassa repsahtanut alkoholisti Nick Halsey (Will Ferrell) on pihalla. Nimittain kun vaimo jattaa ja toista tulee potkut, on surkean miehen ainoa vaihtoehto asettua taloksi etupihalleen uloskannettujen tavaroidensa kanssa. Nickille tarjoutuu kuitenkin pateva porsaanreika paheksutulle ja luvattomalle asuinmuodolleen, kun han saa laillista jatkoaikaa ulkoiluunsa pitamalla pihakirppiksen.

programme.title: Results
programme.desc: PT-valmentajat (Cobie Smulders ja Guy Pearce) saavat tehtavakseen saada uusrikas ja hyvin motivoitumaton asiakas (Kevin Corrigan) kuntoon. Pian tassa fiksussa ja hauskassa rakkautta ja ruumiinkuntoa kasittelevassa komediassa naiden kolmen elama ammatti- ja yksityiselama sotkeutuu umpisolmuun.

programme.title: Mama Weed
programme.desc: Kun alipalkattu poliisin tulkki huomaa takavarikon yhteydessa, etta yksi osallisista on hanen lahipiiriaan, han tekee kohtalokkaan paatoksen. Han onnistuu takavarikoimaan jattimaisen hasiseran, jonka seka poliisi etta alamaailma haluavat, ja kenttakokemuksellaan ja poliisin resursseilla han aloittaa oman rikollisen toimintansa ja vaihtaa huumediilerin uraan.

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years Of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe Khatchadorianilla on vaikeasti lausuttava sukunimi, valtavan vilkas mielikuvitus... ja ongelmia auktoriteettien kanssa. Rafe ei ole mikaan vallankumouksellinen anarkisti, mutta han on kuitenkin aloittamassa koulunkayntia jo jarjestyksessa kolmannella ylaasteellaan. Rafen toita paiskiva yksinhuoltajaaiti toivoo, etta tama koulu lopultakin sopisi hanen pojalleen. Mutta Hills Villagen ylaasteella yksilonvapautta ei kunnioiteta, vaan voimassa ovat epaoikeudenmukaiset kayttaytymissaannot. Rehtori-Dwight ei jata huomioimatta yhtakaan rikkomusta, koska han haluaa pysya ykkosena alueen koulujen suoritustilastoissa.

programme.title: Hamekytta - Pojasta Polvi Paranee
programme.desc: Todistettuaan murhan FBI-agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) ja hanen poikapuolensa (Brandon T. Jackson) joutuvat vetamaan valeasut niskaansa ja ryhtymaan tutkimuksiin – ainoastaan tytoille tarkoitetussa taidekoulussa. Entistakin enemman hauskuutta!

programme.title: Wheres The Money
programme.desc: South Los Angelesista kotoisin oleva nuori ja terava Del saa tietaa, etta hanen vankilassa istuva isansa ja juuri telkien takaa vapautunut setansa ovat varastaneet miljoona dollaria, jotka ovat katkettyina eraan vanhan rakennuksen kellarissa. On vain yksi pieni ongelma: arvostettu yliopisto on levittaytynyt naapurustoon, ja vanha yomaja on askettain keskiluokkaistunut valkoisten opiskelijoiden veljeskuntatalo.

programme.title: Fast Food Nation
programme.desc: Don Anderson on Mickey’sin markkinointivastaava, joka kehitti myos firman suurimman menestyspurilaisen, Big Onen. Tutkimukset paljastavat, etta purilaisten sisalto ei vastaa tuoteselostetta, jolloin Don paattaa alkaa tutkia koko tuotantoketjua. Hanen loytonsa ovat lievasti sanoen jarkyttavia. Fast Food Nation on Oscar-ehdokkaan Richard Linklaterin (Boyhood, Rakkautta ennen aamua) ohjaama draamakomedia, jossa vaikuttavat Greg Kinnear (Little Miss Sunshine, Elama on ihanaa) ja Bruce Willis (Die Hard, Moonrise Kingdom).

programme.title: MacGruber
programme.desc: Maailmanrauha on vaarassa, terroristit vaanivat, maailma tarvitsee supersankarin, jolla on tukka kuin Hillary Clintonilla. Kenelle pitaa soittaa? MacGruberille! Han on sotakone ilman asetta, mutta kehittaa mita vaan pelkasta klemmarista. Han on niin salainenagentti, etta kukaan ei edes tieda miehen etunimea! Naiset haluavat olla kuin han ja miehet haluavat olla hanen kanssaan... vai miten se meni?

programme.title: Fat Kid Rules The World
programme.desc: Troy Billings on seitsemantoista, ylipainoinen ja itsetuhoinen. Juuri kun han aikoo hypata bussin eteen, hanet pelastaakin Marcus, lukion kesken jattanyt hurmaava katumuusikko. Kaksikon valille syntyy orastava ystavyyssuhde kun Marcus ottaa musiikillisilta taidoiltaan vajavaisen Troyn rumpaliksi uuteen punkbandiin. Troy ei aavista, etta hanen pienena hupina pitamassaan asiassa onkin kyse Marcusin halusta paasta punkrockin huipulle, keinolla milla hyvansa..

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: Hellyttava komedia omalaatuisesta keski-ikaisesta kirjailijasta Richard Dunnista (JEFF DANIELS), jonka tyhjan paperin syndrooma on sysannyt syrjaseudulle metsastamaan inspiraatiota. Vaimonsa ja kuvitteellisen supersankarin paheksunnasta huolimatta Richard ystavystyy paikallisen samanmielisen teinityton kanssa. Toisiltaan he saavat vastaukset kysymyksiin, joita he eivat ole osanneet esittaa.

programme.title: Mama Weed
programme.desc: Kun alipalkattu poliisin tulkki huomaa takavarikon yhteydessa, etta yksi osallisista on hanen lahipiiriaan, han tekee kohtalokkaan paatoksen. Han onnistuu takavarikoimaan jattimaisen hasiseran, jonka seka poliisi etta alamaailma haluavat, ja kenttakokemuksellaan ja poliisin resursseilla han aloittaa oman rikollisen toimintansa ja vaihtaa huumediilerin uraan.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: Raavittoman hauska ja torkean naurattava kauhukomedia Paranormal Activityn tyyliin. Rakastunut nuoripari Malcom ja Keisha muuttavat unelmiensa taloon aloittaakseen yhteisen elamansa. Pian talossa alkaa tapahtua mystisia asioita ja selviaa, etteivat he olekaan kahden vaan Keishan on riivannut havyton demoni. Ahdistunut Malcom palkkaa manaajan ja lopulta nykypaivan Ghostbustersitkin ajamaan pois pahan hengen, joka terrorisoi hanen parisuhdettaan… ja ennen kaikkea seksielamaansa.

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Nelja Vietnamin sodan vankileirilta selvinnytta veteraania paattaa suorittaa viimeisen pakonsa - vanhainkodista. Pakosuunnitelman tyostaminen seniilissa porukassa tuo kuitenkin omat haasteensa. Jokaisella on kuitenkin oma unelmansa, jonka vuoksi he ovat valmiita viimeiseen urotekoonsa - aina kun muistavat.

programme.title: The Stag
programme.desc: Moderni sulhanen suostuu vastentahtoisesti polttariviikonloppuun kaupunkilaisystaviensa kanssa. He lahtevat leireilemaan Lansi-Irlannin villiin luontoon. Porukan kauhuksi matkaan lyottaytyy morsiamen arvaamaton veli, johtajahahmo nimelta ”Kone”. Koneen rajahtava luonne ja hurjat johtamistavat vievat ryhman matkalle, jota he eivat unohda ikina.

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: Neighbor for sale
programme.desc: Koskettavassa komediassa repsahtanut alkoholisti Nick Halsey (Will Ferrell) on pihalla. Nimittain kun vaimo jattaa ja toista tulee potkut, on surkean miehen ainoa vaihtoehto asettua taloksi etupihalleen uloskannettujen tavaroidensa kanssa. Nickille tarjoutuu kuitenkin pateva porsaanreika paheksutulle ja luvattomalle asuinmuodolleen, kun han saa laillista jatkoaikaa ulkoiluunsa pitamalla pihakirppiksen.

programme.title: Come to Daddy
programme.desc: Kun Norval saa odottamatta kirjeen vieraantuneelta isaltaan, han matkustaa isan syrjaiselle rantatalolle. Mutta hyvin pian han huomaa omituisen tunnelman, ja kaivatusta jalleentapaamisesta muodostuu helvetillinen painajainen.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: Nimeni on Trinity - paholaisen oikea kasi
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kiertava Trinity paatyy polyiseen pikkukaupunkiin, jossa hanta odottaa todellinen yllatys. Hanen lainsuojaton velipuolensa Bambino on kaupungin sheriffi! Tosin Bambino on ottanut pestin vastaan vain, koska on jalleen lakia paossa ja tarvitsee valehenkilollisyytta piiloutuakseen... Kaupungin mahtavimmalla miehella, majuri Harrimanilla on saalimattomia suunnitelmia valtansa ja maa-alueittensa kasvattamiseksi, mutta laheisessa laaksossa asuva mormoniyhdyskunta on suunnitelmien tiella. Harriman miehineen aikoo vaikka vakipakolla ajaa mormonit alueelta... Mutta yhdyskunnan kanssa ystavystynyt Trinity sotkee mielellaan Harrimanin kuviot.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: To Rome With Love
programme.desc: To Rome With Love on yhteen maailman hurmaavimmista kaupungeista sijoittuva kaleidoskooppinen komedia, jota tahdittavat mm. Alec Baldwin ja Penelope Cruz seka elokuvan ohjaaja Woody Allen. Tutustumme mm. Roomassa lomailevaan,tunnettuun amerikkalaiseen arkkitehtiin, jonka reissu muuttuu aikamatkaksi hanen omaan nuoruuteensa seka keskiluokkaiseen ja perin tavalliseen paikalliseen perheenisaan, josta yhtakkia tuleekin superjulkkis. Ikuisen kaupungin kapeilla kujilla nuoret rakastavaiset Antonio ja Milly joutuvat tahoillaan kummallisten ja romanttisten kohtaamisten kieputukseen.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: In Old Colorado
programme.desc: Hopalong Cassidy and his crew get involved in a war over water rights in this feature from Harry Sherman Productions and Paramount Pictures. The intrigue starts when crafty Joe Weller (Morris Ankrum) turns two ranchers against each other, which leads to dire results. This is the 33rd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy movies, with WIlliam Boyd in the role he made famous. Also, look for regular Hoppy co-stars Russell Hayden as Lucky Jenkins, and Andy Clyde as California Carson.

programme.title: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The Butch Cavendish gang ambushes a group of Texas Rangers, killing all but one. The surviving ranger is nursed back to health by Native American Tonto, and takes on the identity of a masked vigilante, determined to bring all outlaws to justice. Culled from episodes of the popular TV series, this feature is great fun for fans of the Lone Ranger. Starring Clayton Moore and Jay Silverheels.

programme.title: The Light of Western Stars
programme.desc: Knights of the sage-brush roar across the plains in this western drama from Harry Sherman Productions. Victor Jory ( Papillon, Gone With The Wind), stars as a ranch foreman wrongly arrested for murder. The memorable cast includes Tom Tyler (Stage Coach, Adventures of Captain Marvel), plus Noah Beery Jr (The Rockford Files) and in one of his earliest feature roles, Alan Ladd (The Blue Dahlia, Shane).

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days work for him. Its not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Brand of the Devil
programme.desc: The Texas Rangers tangle with a band of dangerous rustlers in this two-fisted production from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Starring Dave OBrien, Kermit Maynard, and Guy Wilkerson, with direction by low-budget ace Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney are sent to Oklahoma to investigate a hanging judge. Stoneys plan to go undercover backfires when he is framed for murder himself. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are assigned to investigate reports of an impostor posing as a U.S. Secret Service agent operating in Washington territory. In the guise of a government law officer, the man is shutting down all rivals of a saloon keepers operating a crooked gambling establishment. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. Originally aired in 1952 on NBC.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to uncover a cattle rustling operation.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho investigate when a railway detective is found dead.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Quantrill and His Raiders
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective tasked with the mission to infiltrate the Quantrill gang before the Lawrence Kansas massacre.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Plus, Bruce Bennet stars as Quantrill, with Steve Darrell as Bloody Bill Anderson.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie investigate a woman named Cattle Kate who seems to be the source of cattle ranches suffering major losses in Sweetwater, Wyoming.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Cattle Kate: Jean Parker. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, Judge Bean appoints himself as the legal guardian of a young man whose father was a member of an outlaw gang. Beans reward -- the boys uncle puts a $3000 bounty on his head ! Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge deals with a rigged election. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie writes to the son of an old female pedlar, unaware that he is a member of an outlaw gang, now on their way to Diablo. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Slim Pickens. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 The Saga of Clement O Toole
programme.desc: Mistaken for a notorious outlaw, a young man struggles to convince the townspeople that he didnt commit a stagecoach robbery. Initially, Annie and Susan Meriwether believe him, but his innocence comes into question when he is present during a bank robbery in which the outlaws seem to recognize him. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye is accused of the crimes committed by Ethan Allan and the Green Mountain boys. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A town starts to believe they are being cursed by a witch after a series of strange occurences. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe Cartwright tries to help a gypsy girl who was abandoned by her people - because they believed she was a werewolf.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Down Texas Way
programme.desc: The sixth film in Monograms Rough Rider series once again follows Buck Roberts (Buck Jones), Tom McCoy (Tim McCall), and Sandy Hopkins (Raymond Hatton) as undercover US Marshals posing as outlaws in order to confound their enemies. When Sandy is framed for murder by a gang of frontier racketeers who hope to take over a small town as their headquarters, Buck and Tom must work separately to save their buddy from a lynch mob and foil the crooks dastardly schemes.

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos
programme.desc: Roy Rogers finds himself elected sheriff in a wild Texas town after the Civil War. But can Roy handle a place under martial law? And can he save Gabby Hayes from being executed? And how many songs will he get to sing? Clear the burrs from your saddle and get ready for a good one, also starring Marjorie Reynolds, plus Sally Payne as Belle Starr, Queen of the Oklahoma Outlaws!

programme.title: Song of Arizona
programme.desc: This Roy Rogers adventure finds Gabby Whitaker (Gabby Hayes) running a ranch for wayward boys. One of the boys uses stolen money to help Gabby pay off his debts, but things unravel when the boys father, a notorious outlaw named King Blaine, is murdered; the rest of the Blaine gang show up at Gabbys looking for the loot! Director Frank McDonald works with a fine cast, including Dale Evans, Lyle Talbot, and of course, Roys beloved horse Trigger.

programme.title: Custers Last Stand
programme.desc: The survivor of an Indian attack acquires a rare medicine arrow, and a menacing character named Blade (Reed Howes) will stop at nothing to take it from him. Elmer Clifton (Assassin of Youth, Seven Doors to Death) directs a memorable cast that includes Rex Lease (The Sign of the Wolf, The Monster Walks), Lona Andre (Slaves in Bondage, Death in the Air), and William Farnum (Samson and Delilah). Meanwhile, Frank McGlynn Jr is in the title role of General George A. Custer.

programme.title: Six Gun Trail
programme.desc: Legendary cowboy star Tim McCoy stars as Captain William Carson, who along with his sidekick Magpie does battle with jewel thieves. Its an actionfilled drama of the West, with plenty of blazing guns and heman adventure! There are a couple of songs, too, including Moon Over the Plains but they arent sung by Tim McCoy. He was too darned tough to sing! Also starring Nora Lane, Ben Corbet; directed by Sam Newfield.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Undercover US Marshal John Carruthers (John Wayne) is investigating a rash of robberies by a character known as The Polka Dot Bandit in this B-movie gem. Along the way, Carruthers finds himself in more trouble than hed ever expected! Written and directed by Robert N. Bradbury, the film features George Gabby Hayes, Eleanor Hunt, and many other favorites of the era. Wayne was only 27 at the time of Blue Steel, but was well on his way to becoming The Duke.

programme.title: Outpost In Morocco
programme.desc: George Raft, Mary Windsor, and Akim Tamiroff star in this romantic drama from director Robert Florey (The Florentine Dagger, Daughter of Shanghai). Raft plays Capt. Gerard, a member of the Foreign Legion known for his romantic entanglements. Hes assigned to escort an emirs daughter to her fathers mountain citadel and learn about the emirs activities. Not surprisingly, Gerard finds trouble brewing! With footage shot in Morocco, this movie also features a beautiful musical score by twotime Oscar nominee Michel Michelet (Voice in the Wind).

programme.title: Lost Canyon
programme.desc: When Johnny Travers (Jay Kirby) is falsely accused of robbing a bank, its up to Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) to clear his name and find the real villains. Theres nothing better than watching Hoppy get rough with the rustlers, and its all the better when you get to hear the Sportsmen Quartette sing (I got Spurs) Jingle, Jangle, Jingle.

programme.title: Wagon Trail
programme.desc: The son of Sheriff Clay Hartley, of the frontier town Elder, has gotten into bad company and hangs out with an outlaw gang in which, Collins, owner of the Golden Rule Saloon, is the secret head. Sheriff Hartley suspects him, but has been unable to gather the needed evidence. Collins instructs his gang, including young Hartley, to hold up the stagecoach on its return trip from Missionary Flats and take the cargo of gold dust it is carrying. Sheriff Hartley is notified of the planned holdup by one of his deputies who has been spying on Collins, and organizes a posse. A deputy-sheriff is killed in the ensuing gunfight between the lawmen and the outlaws, but Deputy Joe Larkin, pursues and...

programme.title: Brothers of the West
programme.desc: Tom Tyler plays Tom Wade, a range detective whose brother has been accused of robbery and murder. Wade has only one clue to prove his brothers innocence: a set of unusual tire tracks. This film was directed by Sam Katzman, who later became known as Jungle Sam for his association with a variety of jungle thrillers, and then as a master of all exploitation genres, from teen horror to flying saucer flicks!

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRCs Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: Flagg is relocating flood victims to Gunsmoke Ranch. The Three Mesquiteers know Flagg to be a crook and try to warn them. They ignore the warning and improve the land only to find that it has been condemned for a new dam.

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: Its the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Farmer Perkins murders a store clerk in front of his wife, and is allowed to walk after his trial, the Cartwrights step in to make sure hell be rearrested, tried, and hung.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After the Virginia City bank is robbed by an outlaw gang, the gangs youngest member gets a job on the Ponderosa. Initially welcomed, Little Joe becomes suspicious of Ponderosas newest member.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After a U.S. deputy marshal saves Adams life from two gunmen, he explains that he is in town to bring a close friend of the Cartwrights to San Francisco to testify in a statewide racketeering trial, but the Deputy Marshals motives for the witness soon become suspicious.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort. From 1960.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: With Tom Edwards ranch going to waste since his becoming a paraplegic following an accident with Ben, Ben makes a business proposition: The Cartwrights will build a mill on Edwards land. In return, Ben requests that he earn his investment money back as well as fifteen percent. The deal is made, but suspicions of Edwards accident bring tension to Ponderosa and put their agreement at risk.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leaders daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Retired U.S. Deputy Marshall Denver McKee struggles to find the suspects responsible for stolen cattle and murdered ranchers.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Visit from a Big Star
programme.desc: A famous movie star (John Vivyan) stays at the Shady Rest Hotel. He wants to get away from the spotlight for a while, but it appears that Uncle Joe has told the entire valley that the hotel has a special guest. .Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Ralph Levy. Episode first aired January 28, 1964

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to convince two rich women that Shady Rest is a farm. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Guy Scarpitta..Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aried in February of 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Very Old Antique
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) tries to sell the Cannonball to a rich man as an antique.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spur Line to Shady Rest
programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quick Hide the Railroad
programme.desc: Kate uses her charms to keep Homer Bedloe from catching the train to Pixley. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Bedloe: Charles Lane. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The President Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel with the intention to terminate the Cannonballs service. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse
programme.desc: Railroad CEO Norman Curtis breaks the Cannonballs throttle lever, threatening the success of the Shady Rest Hotels annual jamboree. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kates intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: Susan Hayward stars in this dramatic tale of the Oklahoma oil boom. She plays Cherokee Lansing, a determined young woman out to protect her fathers honor after hes killed by men from a competing oil company. With a cast that includes Robert Preston, Ed Begley, and Pedro Armendariz, this engaging picture from producer Walter Wanger (Cleopatra, I Want to Live!) was nominated for an Academy Award in the Special Effects category. Also, listen for veteran character actor Chill Wills as the narrator!

programme.title: Over the Hill Gang
programme.desc: A retired Texas Ranger and his three aging pals are hired to clean up a lawless town. Starring Walter Brennan, Edgar Buchanan, Andy Devine, Jack Elam, Gypsy Rose Lee, and Rick Nelson.

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. Youll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Waynes big swinging right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Waynes...

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.title: Doomed Caravan
programme.desc: Hoppy is enlisted to help protect Jane Travers next caravan against robbers who have been terrorizing travelers. He comes across a wily pair of thieves who hve their men disguised as soldiers to escort the caravan. Hoppy isnt fooled for a second and busts up their plan with help from the Bar 20 boys. Not to be outdone, the thieves then capture everyone but Hoppy and puts them before a firing squad. Not its up to Hoppy to rescue his friends singlehandedly. The cast includes William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy, with Russell Hayden and Andy Clyde as Luky Jenkins and California Jack. For those counting, this was the 32nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. They would be edited for syndication...

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2011 : E17 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL
programme.desc: Buckle in for all the epic racing and freestyle action from Raymond James Stadium, on February 5, 2011.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2000 : E08 Alamodome - San Antonio, TX - Freestyle
programme.desc: Dont miss Monster Jam freestyle action at the Alamodome in San Antonio, Texas.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jams 2007 season kicks off with epic racing and freestyle action from Minneapolis, MN, on December 2, 2006.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E13 US Bank Stadium - Minneapolis, MN
programme.desc: Monster Jam heads to Minnesota as the battle for the series championship rages on between Bakugan Dragonoid’s Camden Murphy and Grave Digger’s Adam Anderson. New contenders have emerged as Cole Venard tries to lead the Black Pearl to another event win and Mike Christensen looks to take Vendetta to back to back freestyle victories.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2010 : E21 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL - Freestyle
programme.desc: Monster Jams trucks and drivers continue with freestyle action from Raymond James Stadium, on February 6, 2010.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2022 : E20 Lucas Oil Stadium - Indianapolis, IN
programme.desc: Monster Jams 2022 season continues with round 20 of the Stadium Championship Series, at Lucas Oil Stadium, in Indianapolis, IN.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2001 : E01 Astrodome - Houston, TX - Racing
programme.desc: Were kicking off the new season with a bang! Your favorite trucks and drivers compete in racing at the Astrodome in Houston, TX.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2016 : E07 Edward Jones Dome - St. Louis, MO
programme.desc: They may have lost the Rams, but gained Monster Jam, check out all the action from the Edward Jones Dome in St. Louis.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2021 : E06 NRG Stadium - Houston, TX
programme.desc: Check out all the racing and freestyle action from the Saturday Night show at NRG Stadium on February 13, 2021 during Monster Jams 2021 season!

programme.title: Primetime
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E11 State Farm Stadium - Glendale, AZ
programme.desc: Monster Jam Primetime visits Glendale, AZ for Round 11 of Stadium Championship East.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2009 : E05 Angel Stadium - Anaheim, CA - Racing
programme.desc: All of your favorite trucks and drivers race into Angel Stadium of Anaheim on January 10, 2009.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2010 : E09 Alamodome - San Antonio, TX - Racing
programme.desc: Monster Jam speeds into the Alamodome on January 16, 2010 with racing thrills for the whole family!

programme.title: Monster Jam TV
programme.sub-title: S2014 : E05 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL
programme.desc: Monster Jams 2014 season at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, FL, featuring championship race and freestyle competitions.

programme.title: Monster Jam TV
programme.sub-title: S2012 : E03 MetLife Stadium - East Rutherford, NJ
programme.desc: Monster Jams biggest of the best compete at Metlife Stadium on East Rutherford, NJ.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: S2012 : E03 World Finals XIII - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - Freestyle 1
programme.desc: Dont miss epic freestyle action from Monster Jam World Finals XIII on March 24, 2012.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2019 : E12 Mercedes-Benz Superdome - New Orleans, LA

programme.title: Buyers Guide
programme.desc: We go in search of the ideal bakkie for a growing food business; we find the perfect German sedan within a R1.2 million budget and we examine an Opel Corsa with ongoing turbo problems.

programme.title: Garage Gold
programme.desc: Most valuable collection of carefully kept cars in the back of garages.

programme.title: Petrol Heads
programme.desc: Competitors at the Drift Expo have their hands full as the heavens open up over the Wild Coast Sun. We get up close and personal with a VW Golf 2 with a sting in the tail. A local drag racing star shares some his quarter mile highlights.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The three super cars from this episode promise more power and more elegance. Thanks to tuning company Kelleners Sport, the new BMW 640i Gran Coupe offers even more bite. Thanks to its beautiful equipment and additional legroom, the Maserati Quattroporte GTS encourages to travelling. Thanks to all-wheel drive, the Porsche 911 Carrera 4S offers more fun and more safety on critical terrain.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Test days at the legendary race track in France before the 90th Le Mans Race.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: At the 2013 Frankfurt Motor Show Porsche introduced the new 911 range. It includes the new Porsche 911 Turbo, which is the most powerful Porsche model yet. For 50 years Porsche has been making car drivers around the world very happy with its sports cars. In celebration of the anniversary Supercars takes a closer look at the past, present and future models of the Porsche 911.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Portrait of Ferruccio Lamborghini, who originally built tractors, but then moved on to found one of the most famous sports car factories in the world.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Ferdinand Anton Ernst Porsche was a pioneer of the car business and created an icon among automobiles, the Porsche 356.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: One of the most successful rally drivers of all time, Walter Roehrl.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Hans Joachim Stuck, a racing legend, ended his active career as a race driver in a Lamborghini Gallardo built by Reiter Engineering at the Nurburgring in 2011.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Its time once again for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers are already out there doing test laps, take a behind-the-scenes look at what really goes on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is regared as a dress rehearsal for the 24 hour race.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: A look at the 24 hour race, the Strong Man Run and the Tourist drivers.

programme.title: BMW 503
programme.desc: The noble four-seater 503 convertible was one of BMWs most exclusive models in the 1950s; many international sports and movie stars and other wealthy customers were fond of this sporty luxury vehicle.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Paul has to slide underneath an exploding vehicle, while Anna is catapulted in the air.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: One stuntman has to go head over heels in his car, while two colleagues combine a car chase with a fistfight.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Stuntmen operate an Artega GT at full speed with a remote control.

programme.title: Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur
programme.desc: Flowing lines and an elegance that is unmatched; the 1959 Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur aims to build bridges in the companys model range; from the sporty origin of the brand to the luxury of its new owner, Rolls Royce.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A ride in the Mercedes AMG SLS GT on the airfield and in a Porsche 911 Turbo S on the racetrack; Audi R8s innovative light engineering.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Jaguar is back in the world of sports cars with the F-Type, looking good and showing against the BMW Z4.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Corvette, the Ford Mustang GT and the Chevrolet Camaro are the embodiment of the American sportscar.

programme.title: Lamborghini Huracan by O.CT
programme.desc: A lot of power thanks to a compressor; this optimized O.CT Lamborghini Huracán delivers over 800 horse power to get the blood flowing.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: BMW X5M, Audi Q7, Mercedes GLS, and Porsche Cayenne turbo are the strongest and fastest SUVs of the world. Sports utility vehicles Made in Germany are the embodiment of technical perfection, superior performance and unique comfort.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: Packed with power, panache and charm, a diverse range of high-end SUVs from across the world shows how luxury comes in all sizes and shapes.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: They represent the American lifestyle more than any other car: US SUVs and pickup trucks. They are extremely large, extremely powerful and extremely luxurious and they transport the feeling of unlimited possibilities and adventure.

programme.title: Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10
programme.desc: The Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10 has its origins in the Japanese army; its shape wont win any beauty contests or achieve the best results in the wind tunnel, but this is not really the point with an SUV like this.

programme.title: The Yas Marina Story
programme.desc: The Yas Marina Circuit in Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Team X-Raid at the Dakar Rally
programme.desc: Stephane Peterhansel is the most successful driver in the history of the Dakar Rally; with the German team X-Raid, he won the 2012 and 2013 editions of this prestigious competition in a Mini Countryman.

programme.title: Special - Pikes Peak
programme.desc: For almost a century man and machine have tried to tame the mountain that is Pikes Peak. Daredevils have risked everything to try and be fastest up the 20-kilometer road that summits the rocky mountain at 4300 meters above sea level.

programme.title: Ice Action Finland
programme.desc: Former World Rally Champion Armin Schwarz is a legend behind the wheels. Now he instructs others in driving a 300 hp Subaru WRX STI rally car on the snowy and icy landscape of Finland.

programme.title: Isle of Man TT 2015 Documentary
programme.desc: TT Sidecar champion Klaus Klaffenbock and racing expert Lenz Leberkern explore the fascination behind the Tourist Trophy on the British Isle of Man.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: American SUVs are large, have powerful engines and offer plenty of space.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Everything that has wheels can be tuned, SUVs are no exception either. The big vehicles are already impressive from the get go, but there is always more: powerful wheels, crazy colors and performance data similar to those of super sports cars.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Usually you wouldnt see small cars like the Audi A1, Volkswagen Golf, and Mini on an all-wheel magazine. But when the A becomes an S and the Golf gets an R, the small cars turn into strong all-wheel beasts. Thats reason enough to test them.

programme.title: Tourist Trophy
programme.desc: Riders race through this legendary 37-mile course reaching speeds of over 200 miles per hour in a stunning display of skill and bravery in what has been deemed the most dangerous race in the world.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Subaru shows the new look of WRX STI.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Tesla Roadster Sport can go from 0-100 kph in 3.7 seconds with zero emission, only one aisle and only one engine with 50 kg. The 313 PS has four engines and no sound.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Infiniti wants to stir up the European market with its premium SUVs: The Power SUV FX50 S.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Arabella Classics is one of the most exclusive classic car rallies in Europe.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Go old-timer crazy. A look at the Mercedes S with 160 horsepower, the car that lead Rudolf Caracciola to victory in the 1927 opening race.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Phoenix Racing rocks the DTM; Pit stop training with the Swiss rookie Rahel Frey; Ford GT kit car; A tuned Honda with a Spaniard at the wheel.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Patrick tears up the track in an Aston Martin Zagato with 12 cylinders.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: An angry bull, a few English people prepared for the weather and a young, talented race driver - tourists will be venturing down to the infamous green hell of the Nuerburgring.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Utah is the land of red rocks. That is what is was called by the original inhabitants. Hardly anywhere else on earth are there so many natural wonders in such a small area.

programme.desc: Utah is known as the land of red rocks. That is what is was called by the original inhabitants. Hardly anywhere else on earth are there so many natural wonders in such a small area.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: In 2011, the European Boss Hoss Rally took place in the Pullman City western town in Germany. We show the highlights of this event where nearly 160 V8 monster bikes were gathered.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Featuring the Porsche 550 RS Spyder and the Audi Quattro.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: High tech turbo cars from the 80s get together at the SalzburgRing.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Le Jog classic car rally in Europe.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: At the Nurburgring in Germany, with DTM legends Bernd Schneider and Ellen Lohr.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type and the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A restored 300 SL prepares to race at the Mille Miglia classic car rally.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Indy 500 is one of the worlds most spectacular motor races in the world. Watched by a huge number of people, this motorsports event doesnt fail to impress at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The German Rally Championship has been running since 1970. At the 1983 race, the sporty models from Opel saw exceptional success.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: With the introduction of the Group D-Monsters in the World Rally Championships, the fight for the title got harder and harder. Thats why Audi brought a strong trump onto the road in 1985 - The Sport Quattro.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: In 1954, Mercedes returns to the Grand Prix circuit after 20 years of abstinence.

programme.title: Historic Formula V
programme.desc: In the late 1950s in America, the first Formula V racers were produced. These small cars were seen on tracks until the end of the 1970s, but their heritage would live on through an association known as Historic Formula V Europe.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship Highlights
programme.desc: European Truck Racing Championship kicks off in Misano, Italy, with new tires and two new driver categories.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship Highlights
programme.desc: The teams and drivers head to the southwestern part of Slovakia to prove their expertise near Bratislava at the Automotodrom Slovakia Ring.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship Highlights
programme.desc: The European Truck Racing Championship continues with Round 3 at the challenging Circuit Zolder in Belgium.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth round of the ETRCs season takes place at the Nurburgring, featuring the International ADAC Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship Highlights
programme.desc: The Autodrom Most in the Czech Republic hosts Round 5 of the 2024 European Truck Racing Championship.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship Highlights
programme.desc: For the sixth round of the season of the ETRC, the teams and drivers gather in Le Mans, France.

programme.title: FIA European Truck Racing Championship Highlights
programme.desc: The Circuito del Jarama in Spain hosts Round 7 of the truck racing competition during the current season.

programme.title: NASCAR Whelen Euro
programme.desc: In the 2025 season, Motorvision broadcasts all ENPRO class races live.

programme.desc: Who will be the one to conquer Berlin? GT World Series, Manufacturers Cup.

programme.desc: Experience the thrill of U.K.s winter rallies, with icy roads, skilled drivers and the landscapes.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Jaguar XF-S is supposed to put pressure on BMW, Audi and co. in the business class segment. With V6 power, 380 HP output and all-wheel drive it wants to teach the German top dogs the true meaning of the word fear.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: BMW offers the X2 as a compact hipster SUV for young people; the DS 7 Crossback wants to convey the French lifestyle; Jaguars E-Pace enters the market as a smaller version of the F-Pace.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: There are SUV models that have proven themselves, such as the Range Rover. The British manufacturer wants to reach an even broader audience and introduces a small Rangy: the Velar.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: With 3.5 million units sold worldwide, the Mercedes Sprinter is one of the most popular commercial vehicles. Now in its third generation, it is more modern than ever.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Porsche exits the diesel business. Hybrids such as the Cayenne E-Hybrid are expected to become more important.4x4 tests if the Cayenne E-Hybrid really just consumes 3.2-litres on average. Plus: 4x4 goes on a tour with the BMW X4.

programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker.

programme.title: The Big Stink
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor.

programme.title: Blue Moon Ball
programme.desc: A writer returns to her hometown for inspiration and reinkindles her romance with her first love.

programme.title: Episode 5 - Deadly Departed
programme.desc: Vicki finds that a ghost seeking revenge is actually being summoned forth by his Celtic witch mother.

programme.title: Wish You Were Dead
programme.desc: Hayley Udall tries to make ends meet for herself and her 14 year-old daughter while providing alimony for a horrible ex-husband. She wishes her problems with her ex could go away, and upon venting her frustrations one night, finds herself tangled up in a pact with two people (Melanie and Kevin) to “eliminate” each other’s problems.

programme.title: Nash
programme.desc: This coming of age documentary chronicles the life of NBA All Star Steve Nash as he tries to navigate his way through the somewhat toils of professional sports while trying to leave a lasting legacy on and off the court.

programme.title: Ice Girls
programme.desc: A figure skater is injured during a competition. A coach that hired her then helps her rehab her injury so that she may live her dream.

programme.title: Flowers and Honey
programme.desc: Florist Sarah inherits a ranch and must decide whether to sell it, or live the life of her dreams.

programme.title: Be Mine
programme.desc: A woman finds romance as she prepares to take over her mothers garden store.

programme.title: Hometown Hero
programme.desc: Young divorce lawyer Kelsey finds it safer to keep love out of her life - that is until a stray dog pairs her with Harrison, the local vet.

programme.title: It Had to be You
programme.desc: When her ad agency is absorbed by a much larger, more powerful firm, Darbys rivalry with new partner Derrick could blossom into something else.

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: A woman interprets a kiss at a high school reunion as an invitation to follow her ex across the country and supplant his current family.

programme.title: Gods Club
programme.desc: A debate about allowing school prayer pits Christians against Atheist.

programme.title: His Secret Past
programme.desc: Popular crime novelist, Jennifer Becker lives a lavish life in a small coastal town in California with her daughter, Lily. One day, while out for a run, Lily is attacked--but then rescued by a mysterious stranger named Mick.

programme.title: Fbi: Negotiator
programme.desc: An FBI agent must negotiate with a woman holding a hospital hostage in order to get her hands on an experimental drug.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Beth is wrongly accused of murdering her husband. With the help of an insurance investigator and her stepdaughter together they find the real killer.

programme.title: Love is a Piece of Cake
programme.desc: A baker develops a budding romance with a clients brother while trying to save her cake shop from developers.

programme.title: Episode 9
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori throws her five year old son an epic spiderman birthday party!

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori is throwing a Christmas party in the middle of summer.

programme.title: What Would Jesus Do? The Journey Continues
programme.desc: The journey continues from What Would Jesus Do? (2010) as the drifter arrives into a new town inspiring a group of people to live as Jesus would.

programme.title: Dying for a Baby
programme.desc: A couple is threatened when Jessica, the driver from their past accident, moves in next door seeking revenge.

programme.title: WWJD What Would Jesus Do?
programme.desc: A group of Americans - a singer, a newspaper editor, a pastor and a real estate mogul - vow to walk in the steps of Jesus. Every day, every decision becomes a turning point in their lives as they must ask themselves "What Would Jesus Do?"

programme.title: Loves Second Chance
programme.desc: Stylist Rose inherits her grandmothers dress shop and reconnects with her old crush, Cole, sparking romance.

programme.title: Blue Moon Ball
programme.desc: A writer returns to her hometown for inspiration and reinkindles her romance with her first love.

programme.title: The Perfect Soulmate
programme.desc: A poet with an abusive husband reaches out to a fan for help, only to find an even more dangerous companion.

programme.title: The Wrong Husband
programme.desc: Melanie discovers her husband is actually his twin, Alex, back to steal his life—and willing to kill for it.

programme.title: Episode 9
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: At the Gamma Christmas Mixer, Sarah is missing and her friends search leads to a shocking attack.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Most leave for break, while a few stay behind. Rick is pushed to his breaking point and flips out on Allison.

programme.title: WWJD II The Woodcarver
programme.desc: A troubled youth vandalizes a church and winds up in a close association with the woodcarver whose work he destroyed.

programme.title: Lîle Christmas
