programme.title: Green
programme.desc: After years of being alone, believing they have missed out on love, two people, who are old in years but young at heart, find each other.

programme.title: Recall
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Dave develops amnesia after getting into a car accident with his wife, Cindy. He does not remember his wife at all and only recalls his time with his ex-girlfriend, Stella. As Cindy battles to get Dave to recognise her again, Stella manipulates Dave and worms her way back into his life.

programme.title: Indecent Affair
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When a womans controlling husband convinces her to pose as his cousin at a work event so his philandering boss can seduce her, the consequences are not only dire, but they also impose on everyone a journey of self discovery.

programme.title: Obsession
programme.desc: Jealousy rears its ugly head and puts a couples relationship in jeopardy when they invite guests to stay over in their home.

programme.title: Samantha
programme.desc: An extranged couple decide to get together, along with their new partners, to discuss custody and well-being of the estranged couples daughter, samantha. Things start to go awry as old wounds are reopened and old feelings, good and bad start to resurface.

programme.title: Get Over It
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Muna tries to help her friend, Hauwa, who has just been dumped by her boyfriend. Muna begins a YouTube series to help her friend get out of that post relationship depression by encouraging her to despise men, but she falls in love with their very annoying neighbour instead. Tired of hiding her new relationship, she is stuck with the options of either risking her friendship and career or risking a chance at love.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Salle
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: Tales of Vanessa
programme.desc: Vanessa constantly manipulates her boyfriend, Deji, who has been thoroughly spoiled by his mother, into giving her money. But soon the money Deji is getting from his mother is not enough for her, so she schemes to get it directly from the sources.

programme.title: Flee
programme.desc: A man sees his faith challenged when his integrity compromised by a young woman who is relentlessly after him for marriage.

programme.title: No Late Nights
programme.desc: A newly-wed couple, James and Bella face challenges when Bella’s paranoia about night-time threatens their relationship.

programme.title: My Bosses
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Esther is stuck in a complicated love triangle between two men, Josh, a past love, and Ade, his fun, mischievous friend, both of whom happen to be her new bosses.

programme.title: The Hangout S4 - Ep 2
programme.desc: A group of opinionated, social media-savvy millennials debate controversial topics on love, sex, friendship, and more.

programme.title: My Chances
programme.desc: The loving marriage of Bryan and Jemima starts to show cracks when Bryan loses his job and they seek help from their landlord, Donald. Donald takes a liking to Jemima and offers her a job leading Bryan to begin to feel neglected.

programme.title: Salamatus Rhapsody
programme.desc: Salamatu, a young woman torn between her love for hip-hop and her family’s strong traditional values and expectations, must win her father over to support her love for hip hop.

programme.title: A Different Spice
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Daniel’s life comes crashing down when he catches his wife Emma cheating on him, making him believe that his near perfect life has been a lie. He seeks revenge by deciding to sleep with his mother in law but that plan soon leaves him full of shame.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep3
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her 6-Cardinal Rules. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 4
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her 6-Cardinal Rules. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: Violet
programme.desc: Temi is on the verge of tying the knot with his long time girlfriend Renny, but inexplicably changes his mind when he meets a blind lady named Violet.

programme.title: Uche Who Works In Lekki
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Uche Who Works In Lekki is a black comedy about an ad agency exec who makes a grave mistake by overpromising a payment to a hard-to-get Afrobeat star without the knowledge of his agency and must do everything possible to rectify it before his boss finds out.

programme.title: Maid In A Mansion
programme.desc: A woman is accused of her husband’s death due to their tumultuous relationship, but all is not as it seems within the household.

programme.title: Entanglement
programme.desc: After years of being broke and looking for a job, a man has a chance encounter that lands him a well-paying job, but this threatens to jeopardise his relationship with his girlfriend who has been by his side through thick and thin.

programme.title: Shaffys Sister
programme.desc: Shaffy’s sister, Daisy struggles to interact with her family and find her place in the society after spending years in prison.

programme.title: Satisfy Me
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Satisfy Me follows the life of a lady in her late thirties who wants to settle down by any means, which leads her into marrying a man with narcissistic personality disorder. She loses herself trying to boost his ego, not realising he is mentally unstable until it becomes too late.

programme.title: Shades Of Lies
programme.desc: Tenis ambitions get the best of her when she follows bad advices at work after her boss, chief maxwell, is involved in an accident. When chief maxwells family suspect foul play, the police get involved and it becomes increasingly clear that there is more to chief maxwells death than meets the eye.

programme.title: Double Crossed
programme.desc: When Eric refuses to seek medical remedy for his sexual problems, Adanna discreetly satisfies her starved urge from a close family associate.

programme.title: Green
programme.desc: After years of being alone, believing they have missed out on love, two people, who are old in years but young at heart, find each other.

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. An Uber driver picks up a female passenger who has stolen a large sum of money from a rich psychopath. When he realizes this, he must decide whether to turn her in or become an accomplice as he soon starts to like her.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: When soft spoken and timid Temisan’s world turns upside down and her former loving husband starts to abuse her physically and verbally. She starts to find a seething rage building up inside her.

programme.title: Entangled
programme.desc: A once happy marriage starts to face crisis when the hunsband is promoted and starts having more responsibility at work, leaving his wife to believe he is now neglecting his family responsibilities.

programme.title: A Piece Of Me
programme.desc: Three sisters are torn apart by the actions of one. When Mercy becomes sick and her sister offers her own life to save her, all her sisters become overprotective leading to the wrong decisions being made.

programme.desc: PFL 3, 2018 featured welterweight and middleweight action! Relive 3 spectacular finishes from that electric night featuring eventual World Champions Louis Taylor and Magomed Magomedkerimov

programme.title: World Series of Fighting
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 WSOF5: Arlovski vs. Kyle

programme.title: Blodsbroder
programme.desc: Suoritettuaan pitkan vankilarangaistuksensa Jon on paattanyt aloittaa alusta. Han haluaa opiskella ja elaa ilman huumeita, vakivaltaa ja rikoksia. Lojaalisuus pikkuveljea kohtaan vie hanet kuitenkin pikkuhiljaa takaisin rikollisuuden pariin. Han kohtaa myos suuren rakkautensa Marlenan.

programme.title: A Polar Year
programme.desc: 28-vuotias Anders paattaa matkata Gronlantiin ja ryhtya opettajaksi pienessa kylassa. Hanen vanhempansa ottavat asiaan etaisyytta, silla he olettavat taman ottavan kotitilan haltuunsa, mutta Anders kaipaa maisemanvaihdosta ja uusia haasteita. Elama pienessa kylassa on kovaa – kovempaa kuin Anders oli olettanut. Kylalaiset eivat lampene tulokkaalle, ja mikali han aikoo olla asukkaille – varsinkin lapsille – lainkaan hyodyksi, on hanen tehtava tarkea paatos. Hanen on opittava tuntemaan ihmiset, opeteltava kylan tavoille ja varsinkin tuntea sen perinteet. Vasta sitten aivan uusi maailma aukenee Andersin edessa...

programme.title: Liza Marklund: Punainen Susi
programme.desc: Ruotsalainen iltapaivalehti Kvallspressen on maarannyt rikostoimittaja Annika Bengtzonin tutkimaan monimutkaista murhajuttua. Uhri on toimittajakollega, ja tapauksen ainoa silminnakija on 15-vuotias poika. Bengtzonin tutkimukset saavat yllattavan kaanteen, kun han paasee 40 vuotta vanhan salamurhatapauksen jaljille. Salamurhan vuosipaivan lahestyessa uhreja syntyy lisaa ja Bengtzon soluttautuu yha syvemmalle vallan syovereihin.

programme.title: The Quiet Roar
programme.desc: Marianne (Evabritt Strandberg) on 68-vuotias nainen, jolla on parantumaton sairaus. Ahdistuneena han hakeutuu terapiaan klinikalle, jossa hanta hoidetaan psilosybiinilla (LSD:lla) ja hoitaja Eva (Hanna Schygulla) johdattaa hanet meditaatioon. Hoidossa Marianne siirtyy alitajuntaansa, jossa han tapaa 25-vuotiaan itsensa ja silloisen miehensa.

programme.title: Odd Man Rush
programme.desc: Odd Man Rush perustuu Bill Keenanin humoristiseen muistelmateokseen, josta tuli jymymenestys. Harvardin latkajoukkueen Bobby Sanders siirtyy pelaamaan Ruotsin alemmille sarjatasoille diilissa, johon liittyy mm. laadukas pesukone. Ruotsissa romanttinen suhde paikalliseen tyttoon pakottaa miehen pohtimaan tarkemmin seka elamaa yleensa etta lapsuuden haavetta NHL:ssa pelaamisesta.

programme.title: Liza Marklund: Prime Time
programme.desc: On juhannusaatto, ja kymmenen henkea kuvaa syrjaisessa linnassa tv-ohjelmaa. Seuraavana aamuna Ruotsin suurin tv-tahti on ammuttu kuoliaaksi. Kvallspressen antaa Annika Bengtzonille tehtavaksi seurata murhan tutkintaa, ja pian Annika saa tietaa, etta hanen paras ystavansa Anne Snapphane on yksi epaillyista. Poliisi paastaa epaillyt vapaaksi yhden kerrallaan Annea lukuun ottamatta, ja Bengtzon ottaa henkilokohtaisesti asiakseen osoittaa ystavansa syyttomaksi.

programme.title: 6 Juni
programme.desc: Samira on kaunis 24-vuotias nainen. Hanen perheensa on luvannut hanet vaimoksi miehelle, jota han ei rakasta. Jos Samira ei suostu avioliittoon, hanta uhkaa kunniamurha. Hasse on keski-ikainen mies, joka karsii tuomiota rattijuopumuksesta. Han haaveilee rauhallisesta elamasta vaimonsa ja poikansa kanssa – raittiina. Gertrud on ollut leski jo yhdeksan vuotta. Naapurin Bertil aikoo vihdoinkin voittaa Gertrudin sydamen itselleen ja haudata aviomiehen lopullisesti. Fredrikin tyttoystava on raskaana ja aikoo tehda abortin. 16-vuotias Frederik ei pysty hyvaksymaan tyton paatosta vaan karkaa kotoaan.

programme.title: Kauas pilvet karkaavat
programme.desc: Kauas pilvet karkaavat kertoo helsinkilaispariskunnasta. Raitiovaununkuljettaja ja perinteikkaan ravintola Dubrovnikin hovimestari menettavat tyonsa, mutta eivat toivoaan Aki Kaurismaen (Le Havre) Suomi-trilogian ensimmaisessa osassa.

programme.title: Valehtelija
programme.desc: Valehtelija on kuvaus nuoresta huulenheittajasta, joka ei koskaan puhu totta. Aki Kaurismaen esittama nuori mies kuljeskelee pitkin Helsingin katuja ja koittaa lainata rahaa tutuilta ja tuntemattomilta, milloin millakin verukkeella. Valehtelija on Mika Kaurismaen esikoiselokuva seka diplomityo Munchenin elokuvakoulusta.

programme.title: Ykkoset Ja Nollat - Osa 1
programme.desc: Kriitikoiden ylistama brutaali gangsteridraama Johan Renckilta! FBI ja Interpol saavat vihia suuresta luottokorttisotkusta, ja narkkari Sebbe napataan kiinni epailtyna. Poliisin aloittaessa kuulustelun he saavat kuulla uskomattoman tarinan Goteborgin alamaailmasta. Ruotsalaiset ja venalaiset gangsterit, marokkolaiset hakkerit, korruptoituneet poliitikot ja ahneet virkamiehet - kaikki haluavat ansaita isot rahat, kukaan ei halua olla rakkikoira.

programme.title: Pida huivista kiinni, Tatjana
programme.desc: Koskenkorvaa litkiva automekaanikko Reino (Matti Pellonpaa) ja kahvista riippuvainen perakamarin poika Valto (Mato Valtonen) lahtevat viettamaan viikonloppua ja kohtaavat matkalla virolaisen Tatjanan (Kati Outinen) ja venalaisen Klavdian (Kirsi Tykkylainen).

programme.title: A Polar Year
programme.desc: 28-vuotias Anders paattaa matkata Gronlantiin ja ryhtya opettajaksi pienessa kylassa. Hanen vanhempansa ottavat asiaan etaisyytta, silla he olettavat taman ottavan kotitilan haltuunsa, mutta Anders kaipaa maisemanvaihdosta ja uusia haasteita. Elama pienessa kylassa on kovaa – kovempaa kuin Anders oli olettanut. Kylalaiset eivat lampene tulokkaalle, ja mikali han aikoo olla asukkaille – varsinkin lapsille – lainkaan hyodyksi, on hanen tehtava tarkea paatos. Hanen on opittava tuntemaan ihmiset, opeteltava kylan tavoille ja varsinkin tuntea sen perinteet. Vasta sitten aivan uusi maailma aukenee Andersin edessa...

programme.title: Tulitikkutehtaan tytto
programme.desc: Äitinsa ja isapuolensa kanssa asuva ja tulitikkutehtaan liukuhihnalla tyoskenteleva Iiris (Kati Outinen, Mies vailla menneisyytta ja Le Havre) erehtyy luulemaan tanssiravintolassa kohtaamansa miehen kanssa viettamaansa yota rakkaudeksi. Vaarinkasityksella on kohtalokkaat seuraukset.

programme.title: Lindell - Suruvaippa - Osa 1
programme.desc: Nelja pikkutyttoa valokuvassa. Kaksikymmenta vuotta myohemmin yksi heista loytyy surmattuna. Toinen on kadonnut jaljettomiin. Cato Isaksen on valmiina ratkaisemaan uusia rikosarvoituksia. Menneisyys saavuttaa Lise Sommerin. Paras ystavatar Esther Synnøve Lønn on loytynyt surmattuna ja kurkku auki viillettyna. Joitakin paivia myohemmin myos Estherin poika katoaa. Kun poliisi alkaa rapsuttaa julkisivua, kay ilmi, etta myos eras Lisen ja Esther Synnøven lapsuudenystava on kateissa. Ystavattarien valinen suhde katkee synkkia salaisuuksia. Mita oikeastaan tapahtui tyttojen ollessa pienia?

programme.title: Lindell - Suruvaippa - Osa 2
programme.desc: Nelja pikkutyttoa valokuvassa. Kaksikymmenta vuotta myohemmin yksi heista loytyy surmattuna. Toinen on kadonnut jaljettomiin. Cato Isaksen on valmiina ratkaisemaan uusia rikosarvoituksia. Menneisyys saavuttaa Lise Sommerin. Paras ystavatar Esther Synnøve Lønn on loytynyt surmattuna ja kurkku auki viillettyna. Joitakin paivia myohemmin myos Estherin poika katoaa. Kun poliisi alkaa rapsuttaa julkisivua, kay ilmi, etta myos eras Lisen ja Esther Synnøven lapsuudenystava on kateissa. Ystavattarien valinen suhde katkee synkkia salaisuuksia. Mita oikeastaan tapahtui tyttojen ollessa pienia?

programme.title: Liza Marklund: Studio Sex
programme.desc: Hautausmaata loytyy strippiklubi Studio Sexin nuoren naistyontekijan ruumis. Aluksi vaikuttaa silta, etta tragedia liittyy Tukholman prostituutiopiireihin. Kay kuitenkin ilmi, etta eras tunnettu poliitikko on kaynyt Studio Sex-klubilla samana iltana, ja pian hanta epaillaan murhasta. Rikostoimittaja Annika Bengtzon elaa uudelleen elamanjakson, jonka olisi mieluiten jo unohtanut. Mita syvemmalle synkan alamaailman syovereihin han vajoaa, sita palavammin han haluaa paljastaa nuoren tyton murhaajat.

programme.title: Nicks Film Lightning Over Water
programme.desc: Wim Wendersin ohjaama dokumenttielokuva on syvaluotaava ja koskettava elokuva amerikkalaisen kulttiohjaajan, Nuori kapinallinen -elokuvasta parhaiten tunnetun Nicholas Rayn viimeisista paivista. “Tiesin, etta han halusi tehda tyota, kuolla tyonsa aareen”, Wim Wenders sanoo elokuvassa. YhteistyossaWendersin ja kuvausryhman kanssa Ray tekee kuolemastaan yhteisen projektin ja taideteoksen. Parantumattoman syovan hitaasti riuduttama Ray ei halua laitostua saattokodissa.

programme.title: Liza Marklund: Nobelin Testamentti
programme.desc: Tukholman Nobel-juhliin livahtaa nainen, joka ampuu israelilaisen nobelistin ja Nobel-komitean puheenjohtajan keskella tanssilattiaa. Rikostoimittaja Annika Bengtzon joutuu tahtomattaan keskelle draamaa - ei toimittajan vaan todistajan roolissa. Maailman lehdisto leimaa teon Lahi-idan terrorismiksi, mutta Annikalla on erilainen teoria. Jaljet johtavat juonittelun ja valtapelin synkkaan maailmaan, syvalle Nobeleiden kaikkein pyhimpaan. Totuus voi olla hengenvaarallinen.

programme.title: Kauas pilvet karkaavat
programme.desc: Kauas pilvet karkaavat kertoo helsinkilaispariskunnasta. Raitiovaununkuljettaja ja perinteikkaan ravintola Dubrovnikin hovimestari menettavat tyonsa, mutta eivat toivoaan Aki Kaurismaen (Le Havre) Suomi-trilogian ensimmaisessa osassa.

programme.title: Juha
programme.desc: Juha (Sakari Kuosmanen, Kauas pilvet karkaavat) ja Marja (Kati Outinen, Sauna) elavat yhdessa onnellisina ja viattomina kuin lapset kunnes kaarme luikertelee paratiisiin Shemeikan (Andre Wilms, Boheemielamaa) hahmossa. Juha perustuu Juhani Ahon kuuluisaan romaaniin. Se on myos 1900-luvun viimeinen mykkaelokuva. Musiikin elokuvaan on saveltanyt Anssi Tikanmaki.

programme.title: Valehtelija
programme.desc: Valehtelija on kuvaus nuoresta huulenheittajasta, joka ei koskaan puhu totta. Aki Kaurismaen esittama nuori mies kuljeskelee pitkin Helsingin katuja ja koittaa lainata rahaa tutuilta ja tuntemattomilta, milloin millakin verukkeella. Valehtelija on Mika Kaurismaen esikoiselokuva seka diplomityo Munchenin elokuvakoulusta.

programme.title: Leningrad Cowboys go America
programme.desc: Leningrad Cowboys Go America kertoo maailman huonoimman rock-yhtyeen matkasta Siperian tundralta Yhdysvaltojen kautta Meksikoon despoottisen managerinsa Vladimirin (Matti Pellonpaa) johdolla. Elokuvasta sukeutui kansainvalinen menestys ja se nosti Leningrad Cowboys -yhtyeen maailmanmaineeseen.

programme.title: Varg
programme.desc: Varg on elamaa suurempi tarina Ruotsin ja Norjan rajalla asuvasta Klemensista (Peter Stomare) ja taman sisarenpojasta, Nejlasta.

programme.title: Liza Marklund: Paikka Auringossa
programme.desc: Pimeys on laskeutunut Costa del Solin ylle, kun ruotsalainen lapsiperhe loytyy kotoaan kaasuun tukehtuneena. Annika Bengtzon lahetetaan Marbellaan tutkimaan tapausta, mutta samaan aikaan han kay ex-miehensa Tomasin kanssa oikeustaistelua lapsistaan. Espanjassa jaljet johtavat Annikan idyllisen yhteison kaantopuolelle - kokaiinin, rahanpesun ja raakojen kostotoimien maailmaan. Liza Marklundin romaaneja rikostoimittaja Annika Bengtzonista on myyty yli 10 miljoonaa kappaletta ympari maailmaa. Dekkarikuningattaren kuudesta romaanista on nyt tehty elokuva, ja "Paikka auringossa" on sarjan tiivistunnelmainen paatoselokuva.

programme.title: Ariel
programme.desc: Ariel kertoo Taistosta (Turo Pajala, Hamlet liikemaailmassa), pohjoissuomalaisesta kaivosmiehesta. Kun kaivos suljetaan, Taisto kaantaa Cadillacin keulan kohti etelaa. Helsingissa Taisto asuu Pelastusarmeijan yomajassa, etsii tyota ja rakastuu uutteraan yksinhuoltajaaitiin. Sitten kohtalo puuttuu peliin. Arielin paaosaa esittava Turo Pajala sai roolistaan Moskovan elokuvajuhlilla parhaan miesnayttelijan palkinnon. Elokuva voitti myos FIPRESCIN palkinnon. Yhdysvalloissa elokuvakriitikot valitsivat Arielin vuoden 1990 parhaaksi ulkomaiseksi elokuvaksi.

programme.title: Ykkoset Ja Nollat - Osa 1
programme.desc: Kriitikoiden ylistama brutaali gangsteridraama Johan Renckilta! FBI ja Interpol saavat vihia suuresta luottokorttisotkusta, ja narkkari Sebbe napataan kiinni epailtyna. Poliisin aloittaessa kuulustelun he saavat kuulla uskomattoman tarinan Goteborgin alamaailmasta. programme.title: Lindell: Unenvartija - Osa 1
programme.desc: Unenvartija on sietamattoman jannittava rikostarina, jossa psykologiset pohjasavyt kuljettavat tapahtumia eteenpain, kunnes kaikki paattyy dramaattiseen kilpajuoksuun haikailemattoman murhaajan kanssa. Kuka on tirkistelija, joka seisoo ikkunassa ja tarkkailee vastapaisen asunnon nuoria naisia? Liittyyko han jotenkin 19-vuotiaan Therese Geberin murhaan, ja onko han sama kuin mies, joka tunkeutuu yolla naisten asuntoon? Rikoskomisario Cato Isaksen saa uuden jutun ratkaistavakseen.

programme.title: Lindell - Suruvaippa - Osa 2

programme.title: Making Fashion History

programme.title: Top of The Class

programme.title: Buckle Up!
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Season winners face the dreaded Unconventional Challenge on-board an airplane.

programme.title: Of Corsets Fashion
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Project Runway All Stars

programme.title: On The Prowl

programme.title: Pedal to The Metal
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Project Runway All Stars

programme.title: Pure Imagination

programme.title: Pennneys From Heaven

programme.title: All-inclusive
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: The world championship heats up as designers create gende-neutral streetwear.

programme.title: Climate Quick Change
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: The All Stars battle extreme weather for resort wear that transitions from one climate into another.

programme.title: Nina Says Dont Cry Over Spilt Silk
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: Nina Garcia challenges season winners to design modern ball gowns in luxurious silk.

programme.title: Modern Families
programme.sub-title: S07 : E12 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: The remaining All Stars create fashion for “modern” families to secure their place in the finale.

programme.title: All The Worlds A Runway
programme.sub-title: S07 : E13 Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: A world champion is crowned as designers produce runway collections in front of NY’s fashion elite.

programme.title: Welcome to Los Angeles!
programme.desc: The designers must create innovative red carpet looks that reflect their individual points of view.

programme.title: We Expect Fashion
programme.desc: The designers must create fashionable maternity wear for actress Rebecca Romijn.

programme.title: Rumble on the Runway
programme.desc: For the Garnier Challenge, the designers must work in teams to create fun and fashionable surf wear.

programme.title: What a Woman Wants
programme.desc: The designers must create standout looks for their models to wear to an industry event.

programme.title: Fashion Headliners
programme.desc: In the Unconventional Materials Challenge the designers must use newspaper to create their garments.

programme.title: Lights, Camera, Sew!
programme.desc: In the L’Oreal Challenge, the designers must create garments inspired by different movie genres.

programme.title: The Sky is the Limit
programme.desc: For the Macy’s INC Challenge, designers work in teams to create garments using only blue material.

programme.title: A Fashionable New Beginning
programme.desc: The designers must convert recent divorcees’ wedding dresses into fashionable new looks.

programme.title: Sequins, Feathers and Fur, Oh My!
programme.desc: Designers must create extravagant stage looks for Christina Aguilera with Bob Mackie as inspiration.

programme.title: Around the World in Two Days
programme.desc: For the Michael Kors Challenge, the designers must create looks inspired by cities around the world.

programme.title: The Best of the Best
programme.desc: The designers must create companion looks that complement and enhance their best looks so far.

programme.title: The Art of Fashion
programme.desc: The designers must create a look using the Getty Center as inspiration.

programme.title: Finale Part 1
programme.desc: The three remaining designers are challenged to create a 12-piece collection to show Bryant Park.

programme.title: Finale Part 2
programme.desc: After showing at New York Fashion Week, one designer is named the winner of Project Runway Season 6.

programme.title: Back to New York
programme.desc: Tim presents the designers with their first challenge during a trip to Central Park.

programme.title: The Fashion Farm
programme.desc: The designers are taken to a farm where they are faced with an unusual fabric choice.

programme.title: The His and Lows of Fashion
programme.desc: Designers butt heads when they have to work in teams of two, as personalities clash in the workroom.

programme.title: Design Your Heart Out
programme.desc: The designers create a signature dress for the Campbells "AdDRESS Your Heart" program.

programme.title: Run for Cover
programme.desc: The bar is raised when the designers get one of the biggest challenges in Project Runway history.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 The Fifth Wars - Grand Final
programme.desc: This episode, Robot Wars: The Fifth Wars will have a champion. As the proven best robots of the series gather one last time, the competition has never been more evenly matched.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 The Fifth Wars - Heat A
programme.desc: The first heat of the Fifth Wars raises the bar for action. With newcomers outnumbering the veterans, will and underdog manage to secure a place in the finals?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 The Fifth Wars - Heat B
programme.desc: One newcomer gets a forceful yet thorough tour of the arena hazards in the eliminators. Flippers prove to be this heats weapon of choice and they are put to great effect, as many robots take to the air.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 The Fifth Wars - Heat C
programme.desc: The eliminators continue as more newcomers and veterans enter the arena, ready to destroy each other for the spot in the finals. One competitor’s design renders their adversary’s weapon useless, can they adapt, or will they be wiped out?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 The Fifth Wars - Heat D
programme.desc: More flipping action as we witness one of the quickest immobilisations in Robot Wars history. A house robot gets a little too eager when trying to pit a competitor.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 The Fifth Wars - Heat E
programme.desc: More hopefuls enter the arena, as they risk life and limb for a chance at the finals. An equally matched battle leaves the decisions to the judges, and two house robots work together to inflict some last minute damage.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 The Fifth Wars - Heat F
programme.desc: Halfway through the heats and the competition is on fire, literally. The arena is out for revenge after another competitor inadvertently vandalises it. One robot commits the ultimate sin, attacking the benevolent Refbot.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 The Fifth Wars - Heat G
programme.desc: The house robots venture into the funeral business as they hold cremations and burials in the Robot Wars arena, to the applause of a live audience. One flip may spell doom early on for one competitor.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 The Fifth Wars - Heat H
programme.desc: One competitor achieves every flipper robot’s dream in this episode’s heats, rapidly ending the first round. Another robot refuses to go into the pit alone and takes down whoever they can get grip on.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 The Fifth Wars - Heat I
programme.desc: One competitor gets chopped up by competitor and house robot alike and a quick eviction from the arena makes the judge’s job a simple one. A seemingly one-sided fight takes a different direction, thanks to the hazardous arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 The Fifth Wars - Heat J
programme.desc: When the competitor’s weapons aren’t quite doing the job, they must resort to using the arena to secure the win. There’s not enough room for the both of them, which robot from the Isle of Sheppey will prove itself the best in this chance encounter.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 The Fifth Wars - Heat K
programme.desc: World Champions meet a newcomer in this episode’s heat, will it be an easy appetiser, or a major upset? One uneventful round leaves the house robots responsible for entertaining the crowd.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 The Fifth Wars - Heat L
programme.desc: The last heats of the fifth series. Matilda breaks the rules and strays from her zone, inflicting massive damage on unsuspecting robots, much to the dismay of the judges.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 The Fifth Wars - Semi Final 1
programme.desc: The semi-finals are here and the competitors step up a notch, even the house robots need to be cautious. One of the three losers of the first rounds have an opportunity for redemption in the Losers Melee.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 The Fifth Wars - Semi Final 2
programme.desc: After this episode, the Grand Final lineup will be decided. With pressure mounting the robots are going all out. One competitor is sent to the clouds with the help of another. The house robots help decide who makes it to through.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 The Fifth Wars - Grand Final
programme.desc: This episode, Robot Wars: The Fifth Wars will have a champion. As the proven best robots of the series gather one last time, the competition has never been more evenly matched.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Robot Wars returns. The House Robots have been upgraded and are ready to dismantle any of the 40 competing teams brave enough to enter the hazardous arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A Consultant Cardiologist and his two sons try their luck with a brand new, untested machine. Judge Sethu Vijayakumar discusses his work with Nasa in creating androids for the Mission to Mars.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: This show features an eclectic collection of home-made robots, one designed by a nine year old and another constructed out of wood. Some competitors from the Classic series return to the arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: In this show we see the former Holiday camp Bluecoats daring to flip two of the House Robots with their ‘launcher’ Apollo. The most expensive Robot in the Series competes in this Heat.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: This features one of the most bizarre but certainly the tallest robot ever seen on Robot Wars, Gabriel, built my Mensa member Craig and his three sons.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: In this show the heat winners in shows 1 to 5 come back to fight again. The judges must choose one Wild Card from the runners up to join them.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Robot fightings newest competition begins! In the first heat, meet new robots and some familiar faces as teams get a feel for the arena and size up their competition. Filmed in Grantham in front of a live audience, robots battle for survival in the Robots Live Arena.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Heat 2 of the UKs most brutal robot combat competition takes the action to Crawley in the south of England. Winners and losers from Heat 1 face fresh opponents, fighting to secure a win and guarantee their place in the finals.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Its the last chance for teams to secure a spot before the final. In savage and tactical 1v1 matches, teams battle for a place in the top 16. New robots join the fray, hoping for a last-minute victory to advance to the championship.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Using competitors own video diaries, exclusive action from the pits and the best of the battles, Philippa Forrester will get down to the nuts and bolts of Robot Wars, The Second Wars.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Philippa goes behind the scenes to find out how the shows fighting machines are made, whilst uncovering the trials and tribulations of their frantic creators.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Another visit behind the scenes of Robot Wars Series 2, more exclusive footage and access to the pits shows every nook and cranny of this week’s competitors.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Witness hope, triumph, desperation and defeat as Philippa takes us back to the pits, where competitors make final touches to their Robots, hoping they come back in one piece.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Get a glimpse of how the production team setup the arena for contests such as jousting and pinball. Gain an insight as to how competitors construct their robots from team video diaries.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Ultimate Collection: House Robots
programme.desc: An extensive and informative dive behind-the-scenes on the House Robots. Get inside information from designer Chris Reynolds, on what goes into creating these killing machines.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Follow Team Chaoss journey. From humble beginnings to how they ended up building one of the most feared Robots ever to compete.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: In this show the heat winners in shows 1 to 5 come back to fight again. The judges must choose one Wild Card from the runners up to join them.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The first heat of the second Revival Series begins. Robots return from previous series to take on the daring newcomers and each other. Competitors get bullied and thrown around the ring as they desperately try to scrape a place in the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A tentative start to the second heat ends in carnage as the house robots and competitors go all out to qualify. Shunt delivers the final blow for one contestant.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The third heat shows devastating weapons put into action, being on the receiving end of these could mean elimination for an unlucky competitor. The house robots take on cleaning duties as they remove immobilised robots from the arena floor.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: One competitor draws first blood only seconds into the first round. After suffering severe damage at the hands of another competitor, one robots chance at the finals may be lost.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The last chance for combatants to fight for a place in the Grand Final. With the newcomers outnumbering the veterans, will the first timers make up for their lack of experience?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: This episode, a new Robot Wars champion will emerge! Sparks and scraps are sure to fly in this explosive series finale. Winners will have to make it through the four-way melees and head-to-head battles to be able to prove themselves in the final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Newcomers, veterans and a recent President enter the fray in this first Heat of the series. Competitors are eliminated left, right and centre and only the strongest will survive to compete in the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A veteran only heat features the current reigning Champions, Carbide. Will Carbide’s streak be brought to an end by the other robots, more experienced and eager than ever?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Even the judges aren’t safe as two robots collide, sending shrapnel through the bullet-resistant shields around the arena. Two very different styles of robot meet in the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: One newcomer stares down seven veterans, will their induction into the arena be successful, or will their inexperience find them in the pit? One robot will have a second chance to qualify in the Redemption Round.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The final heat features only veterans, here for an opportunity to make up for their mistakes in the previous tournaments. Only one competitor will make it into the Grand Finals, and the others must suffer defeat, again.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: After lengthy repairs and inspirational pep talks, the qualifiers prepare to fight for the title. A 10-way Robot Rumble will give the victor a spot in the Grand Finals, alongside the heat winners.

programme.title: Burning Man
programme.desc: Tom on huonosti kayttaytyva mies. Levoton ja karsimaton kaveri, joka harrastaa omituisia irtosuhteita ja tekee kaikkensa ajaakseen asiakkaat ravintolasta, jossa han tyoskentelee kokkimestarina. Mita tahansa han tekeekin, ihmiset hanen ymparillaan tuntuvat hyvaksyvan hanet sellaisena kuin han on. Karen on ainoa, joka yrittaa saada Tomin kantamaan vastuunsa 8-vuotiaasta pojastaan, Oscarista. Kun Tomin vihanhallinta karkaa kasista pojan syntymapaivajuhlissa, Karen joutuu noutamaan Oscarin poliisiasemalta.

programme.title: Bottled with Love
programme.desc: Abbey on onneton, turhautunut ja melkein toivosta luopunut uranainen, koska deittailu ei ota sujuakseen. Isoaiti ehdottaa, etta Abbey kirjoittaisi kaikki toiveensa rakkauskirjeeksi suoraan sydamestaan. Abbey noudattaa neuvoa vastahakoisesti, panee kirjeen pulloon ja heittaa sen mereen. Aika kuluu, ja kuukausia myohemmin Abbey aloittaa projektin pomonsa pojan Nickin kanssa. Nick on sattumalta loytanyt pullopostin tietamatta, etta se on Abbeyn. Mutta vahitellen han tajuaa yhdistaa kirjeen Abbeyyn. Tilanne ja salaisuus kayvat hyvin kiusalliseksi ja Nick paattaa kertoa kirjeesta. Koska Nick on salannut asiaa pitkaan, Abbey kaskee hanta painumaan hemmettiin. Mutta Nick ei vahasta saikahda.

programme.title: Equals
programme.desc: Utopistisessa maailmassa, missa vakivalta ja rikollisuus on kitketty poistamalla ihmisten tunteet geneettisesti, eletaan Nian ja Silasin tavoin rauhallista ja yksitoikkoista elamaa. Tyopaikallaan tiedotusmateriaalien tuotantolaitoksessa he vaihtavat tyotoverien kesken ainoastaan kohteliaisuuksia. Elama on yksinkertaista kunnes huhu tartunnasta, jonka seurauksena ihminen nayttaa tunteensa, leviaa. Sairastuneet lahetetaan pois, eika heita nahda enaa koskaan. Silas epailee kantavansa tartuntaa, ja asian vahvistuttua hanesta tulee hylkio. Silti han tuntee vetoa Niaan, joka on myos saanut tartunnan, mutta onnistuu salaamaan oireensa.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Emmalla (Kate Micucci) ei ole koskaan ollut onnea rakkaudessa. Han viihtyy paremmin koiransa ja kissansa seurassa. Ihmeellisen kosmisen kohtalon kautta hanen lemmikkinsa muuttuvat parhaiksi inhimillisiksi versioiksi itsestaan. Kissasta tulee tyylikas, salaperainen Diego (Justin Chatwin) ja koirasta leikkisa ja rakastettava Sam (Stev Howey). He kilpailevat Emman huomiosta, kun taas Emmalla ei ole aavistustakaan lemmikkiensa muuttumisesta ihmisiksi. Tama johtaa lannistaviin treffeihin ja koomisiin tilanteisiin. Vahitellen Emma alkaa arvioida uudelleen ajatuksiaan seurustelusta, ja miettii sen sijaan mahdollisuutta voida oikeasti rakastaa.

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: Yksinainen leski suunnittelee maailmanymparimatkaa aviomiehensa tuhkien kanssa kaydakseen paikoissa, joihin he ihastuivat katsomissaan elokuvissa. Matkan ensimmainen etappi muuttaa hanen elamansa iaksi.

programme.title: Wingman, Inc
programme.desc: Hurmaava ja kohtelias Bobby Tomkins on aina ollut ystaviensa ykkosvalinta apuriksi naisten metsastykseen. Bobbyn epaonneksi han kuitenkin onnistuu itse iskemaan silmansa Kristyyn, johon eivat pelimiesten keinot tehoa. Ennen kuin kaksikko huomaa olevansa ihastumassa pahimpaan viholliseensa, on luvassa raaviton seikkailu deittailun armottomassa viidakossa.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: We Too Together
programme.desc: Rob on tullut kotiin sodasta ja hanta vaivaa traumaperainen stressihairio. Vahitellen han saa otteen menneisyytensa hallinnasta, Joulunpyhina han tutustuu Gabrielaan ja menettaa talle sydamensa. Elamanmuutos on valtava ja elama saa taas merkityksen.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) on tavallinen tytto, josta tulee vahingossa prinsessa, kun perheen kesamatka Pariisiin muuttuu elaman laajuiseksi fantasiaksi. Grace, joka elaa kuin kuninkaallinen kahden parhaan ystavansa kanssa, huomaa, kuka han todella on – omaksumalla toisen henkilon identiteetin.

programme.title: Bottled with Love
programme.desc: Abbey on onneton, turhautunut ja melkein toivosta luopunut uranainen, koska deittailu ei ota sujuakseen. Isoaiti ehdottaa, etta Abbey kirjoittaisi kaikki toiveensa rakkauskirjeeksi suoraan sydamestaan. Abbey noudattaa neuvoa vastahakoisesti, panee kirjeen pulloon ja heittaa sen mereen. Aika kuluu, ja kuukausia myohemmin Abbey aloittaa projektin pomonsa pojan Nickin kanssa. Nick on sattumalta loytanyt pullopostin tietamatta, etta se on Abbeyn. Mutta vahitellen han tajuaa yhdistaa kirjeen Abbeyyn. Tilanne ja salaisuus kayvat hyvin kiusalliseksi ja Nick paattaa kertoa kirjeesta. Koska Nick on salannut asiaa pitkaan, Abbey kaskee hanta painumaan hemmettiin. Mutta Nick ei vahasta saikahda.

programme.title: Breaking and Exiting
programme.desc: Harry (Milo Gibson) on hurmaava taparikollinen, jolla on tapana ryostaa taloja. Han joutuu odottamattoman haasteen eteen tormatessaan ryostoyrityksen yhteydessa Daisyyn (Jordan Hinson), nuoreen naiseen, joka on aikeissa tehda itsemurhan.

programme.title: Below Her Mouth
programme.desc: Dallas on vasynyt kuvioihinsa. Han raataa paivat katontekijana ja tapaa rakastajattaria oisin – paivasta toiseen. Kunnes han tapaa itsevarman ja menestyneen muotitoimittajan Jasminen eraalla klubilla. He tuntevat vetoa toisiinsa heti ensi katseesta ja heittaytyvat intohimoiseen suhteeseen.

programme.title: Some Girls
programme.desc: Juuri ennen haitaan menestyva kirjailija (Adam Brody) matkustelee ympari maata tapaamassa entisia tyttoystaviaan (Jennifer Morrison, Mía Maestro, Emily Watson, Zoe Kazan ja Kristen Bell) hyvittaakseen tekemansa vaaryydet.

programme.title: Kirjava huntu (The Painted Veil)
programme.desc: Laakari Walter Fane ja hanen vaimonsa Kitty ovat komennuksella Shanghaissa, jossa Walter on toissa paikallisessa sairaalassa. Walterin vaativa tyo vie kaiken liikenevan ajan ja yksinainen Kitty ajautuu englantilaisen diplomaatin Charles Townsendin syleilyyn. Kun Walter saa tietaa vaimonsa uskottomuudesta, han janoaa kostoa. Walter hyvaksyy vaarallisen tyon kiinalaisessa pikkukylassa, jossa riehuu kuolettava koleraepidemia. Kittylla ei ole muuta mahdollisuutta kuin seurata miestaan maaseudulle kauas kaikesta.

programme.title: The Last Kiss
programme.desc: Vauva on tulossa! Lahestyva harmaa keski-ikaisyys ja isyyden herattamat monet tunteet hammentavat miesta, jonka pasmat sekoavat totaalisesti kun vastaan kavelee kaunis teinitytto Kim.

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva komedia mallikansalaisesta Steven Russellista (JIM CARREY), jonka radikaalilla elamanmuutoksella on hintansa. Patologisen valehtelijan munaukset vievat miehen suoraan kaapista hakkiin, kun han jaa luksuselamansa rahoittamiseen kehitetyista superhuijauksista kiinni rysan paalta. Vankilassa Stevenin yllattaa kuitenkin takaapain rynniva rakkaus, jota huijarin taipumukset ja poliisien pamput kuitenkin vaikeuttavat. Stevenilla on kuitenkin sairaita suunnitelmia rakastuneen parin saattamiseksi jalleen yhteen...

programme.title: Wicker Park
programme.desc: Matthew och Lisa ar oskiljaktiga. Deras passionerade karlek går inte att ta miste på. Men så plotsligt forsvinner hon- lamnar honom utan ett ord- och Matthews varld rasar samman. Nu, två år senare, har Matthew borjat komma over den varsta saknaden. Men nar han plotsligt får vad han tror ar en skymt av henne i folkvimlet ar det som att han blivit traffad av blixten- han måste få se henne. Efter ett intensivt letande hittar han henne. Tror han. For nar smartan och begaret blir for stort kan den forvranga dina sinnesbilder.

programme.title: Jack and Jill Vs. The World
programme.desc: Jack on rutiineihin kangistunut mainosalan ammattilainen ja omaa New Yorkin juppien arvot. Eraana paivana han kuitenkin tormaa Jilliin, naiiviin nuoreen naiseen, joka on ihastuttava naky suurkaupungin ymparistossa. Jack tekee vaikutuksen Jilliin tarjotessaan hanelle toita seka huonetta asunnostaan. Hanen ystavallisyytensa koskettaa Jillia ja he ajautuvatkin nopeasti romanttisen suhteeseen, joka perustuu listaan saannoista joita Jill vaatii noudatettavan. Jillin eloisuus kaantaa Jackin maailman ylosalaisin, mutta hanta vaivaa uuden rakkautensa taustoja koskevien aiheiden valttely. Kaikki ei ole sita milta nayttaa ja Jillilla on salaisuus, joka saattaa muuttaa kaiken...

programme.title: Shes The Man
programme.desc: Viola Hastings (Amanda Bynes) kuulee kauhukseen, etta tyttojen futisjoukkue lopetetaan. Kun portti poikien joukkueeseen ei muuten aukea, Viola paattaa esiintya veljenaan Sebastianina, jonka oleskelu Lontoossa venahtaa. Mutta pojan rooli ei olekaan ihan helppo vetaa, etenkaan kun kamppiksena on sopo Duke (Channing Tatum), joka tosin on ihastunut kauniiseen Oliviaan (Laura Ramsey), joka puolestaan ihastuu herkkaan uuteen poikaan Sebastianiin... Elokuva perustuu kevytjuustoakin loysemmin Shakespearen Loppiaisaattoon.

programme.title: Couples Vacation
programme.desc: Kun kirjailija Jack Spencerin avioliitto ja ura ovat menossa karille, han lahtee vaimonsa Amandan kanssa minilomalle syrjaiselle maatilalle. Yllattava tuplabuukkaus vie lomasta romantiikan rippeetkin, ja tilan komea omistaja vokottelee vaimoa. Jack joutuu yhtakkia kohtaamaan tunnemyllakan. Rakkaus, mustasukkaisuus ja unelmat riivaavat, ja kylalaiset ovat liiankin auliita tuputtamaan apua.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Emmalla (Kate Micucci) ei ole koskaan ollut onnea rakkaudessa. Han viihtyy paremmin koiransa ja kissansa seurassa. Ihmeellisen kosmisen kohtalon kautta hanen lemmikkinsa muuttuvat parhaiksi inhimillisiksi versioiksi itsestaan. Kissasta tulee tyylikas, salaperainen Diego (Justin Chatwin) ja koirasta leikkisa ja rakastettava Sam (Stev Howey). He kilpailevat Emman huomiosta, kun taas Emmalla ei ole aavistustakaan lemmikkiensa muuttumisesta ihmisiksi. Tama johtaa lannistaviin treffeihin ja koomisiin tilanteisiin. Vahitellen Emma alkaa arvioida uudelleen ajatuksiaan seurustelusta, ja miettii sen sijaan mahdollisuutta voida oikeasti rakastaa.

programme.title: Youth In Revolt
programme.desc: C.D. Paynen kulttikirjasarjaan perustuva varikkaan raavi, mutta sympaattinen elokuva aalioaikuisten ymparoiman Nick Twispin elamasta. Nick rakastuu palavasti upeaan Sheeniin, mutta perhe, etaisyys ja exan vehkeilyt pitavat parin erossa. Ongelmat oikomaan Nick luo viekkaan, viiksekkaan ja itsevarman sivupersoonan Francoisen, jonka ohjaksissa asiat kuitenkin mutkistuvat entisestaan. Sekopaista tarinaa tahdittaa mm. Steve Buscemi, Ray Liotta ja Justin Long

programme.title: Equals
programme.desc: Utopistisessa maailmassa, missa vakivalta ja rikollisuus on kitketty poistamalla ihmisten tunteet geneettisesti, eletaan Nian ja Silasin tavoin rauhallista ja yksitoikkoista elamaa. Tyopaikallaan tiedotusmateriaalien tuotantolaitoksessa he vaihtavat tyotoverien kesken ainoastaan kohteliaisuuksia. Elama on yksinkertaista kunnes huhu tartunnasta, jonka seurauksena ihminen nayttaa tunteensa, leviaa. Sairastuneet lahetetaan pois, eika heita nahda enaa koskaan. Silas epailee kantavansa tartuntaa, ja asian vahvistuttua hanesta tulee hylkio. Silti han tuntee vetoa Niaan, joka on myos saanut tartunnan, mutta onnistuu salaamaan oireensa.

programme.title: Loves Last Resort
programme.desc: 10 vuoden seurustelun jalkeen Chloen poikaystava Eric ei ole viela kypsynyt Chloen haluamaksi mieheksi. Chloe toivoo voivansa nopeuttaa asioiden kulkua jattamalla hanet. Kuusi kuukautta myohemmin he tapaavat, ja Eric paljastaa menevansa naimisiin. Paastakseen pois kaikesta Chloe lahtee lomalle, ja samaan lomapaikkaan ilmestyy Eric tyttoystavansa kanssa.

programme.title: Death of a Ladies Man
programme.desc: Brooklynin, Oncen ja Chicagon draamakomedia elamasta ja rakkaudesta hoystettyna Leonard Cohenin lauluilla. Samuel O’Shea, runoutta opettava professori on eloisa naistenmetsastaja ja innokas juomari. Toinen avioliitto on paattymassa, ja ex-vaimo ja lapset ovat ymmallaan hanen suhteensa. Huolestuttavinta on, etta han on alkanut nahda asioita: kaivattu isa, joka kuoli Samuelin ollessa poika, tulee rupattelemaan. Ensin Samuel epailee sen johtuvan viinasta, tai ehka han on vain hullu tai mielikuvitus laukkaa liikaa, mutta sitten tulee tieto aivokasvaimesta.

programme.title: L.A. Gigolo
programme.desc: Rohkea komedia varakkaita naisia viettelevasta Nikkista (Ashton Kutcher), jolle pinnallisuus ja luksuselama maaraavat elaman tahdin. Uusimman valloituksen Samanthan (Anne Heche) hulppeassa lukaalissa kelpaa bailata ja nauttia saavutuksista emannan ansaitessa lisaa taaloja Nikkin tuhlattavaksi. Tosirakkauden astuessa kuvaan naistennaurattaja joutuu kuitenkin tarkistamaan motiivinsa ja paivittamaan tulevaisuudensuunnitelmansa.

programme.title: The Last Kiss
programme.desc: Vauva on tulossa! Lahestyva harmaa keski-ikaisyys ja isyyden herattamat monet tunteet hammentavat miesta, jonka pasmat sekoavat totaalisesti kun vastaan kavelee kaunis teinitytto Kim.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Don Martellin siloinen elama pyorii perheen, kavereiden ja punttitreenin ymparilla, minka lisaksi han kay uskollisesti kirkossa joka pyha. Kavereidensa ”Don Joniksi” ristima hurmuri iskee baarista pelkkia taydellisia naisia, joista kukaan ei kuitenkaan veda vertoja pornolle. Don joutuu arvioimaan keskenkasvuisia mieltymyksiaan uudestaan, kun han tapaa ihanan Barbaran, jonka kasitys unelmien miehesta ei vastaa lainkaan Donia.

programme.title: Bad Cupid
programme.desc: Archie ottaa tosissaan tehtavansa: huolehtia, etta aito rakkaus voittaa aina. Hanen toimintatapansa eivat kuitenkaan ole aina aivan tavanomaiset. Kaikki Archien tielle osuvat saavat varoa, silla han ei kaihda keinoja paatettyaan jotain.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The first in the season will see Catherine Bennett and her youngest daughter Sarah Jane keen to downsize from their huge 13-bedroomed house in Mullingar. Theyre planning to move down the road, where they also own a 3-bed bungalow thats been uninhabited for the last nine years.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot faces a unique challenge in Clane, Co. Kildare.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Architect Dermot Bannon helps Senator Katherine Zappone and Dr Ann Louise Gilligan renovate a dilapidated hunting lodge in Brittas, Dublin.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Desperate for more space, a couple with two young daughters, who have long since outgrown their tiny cottage in Killawalla outside Westport, engage Dermot to help.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot revamps a Rathfarnham four-bed to suit the changing needs of its occupants Peter, Lisa and their twins Grace and Louise (9) live in a four-bed house in Rathfarnham, Dublin 14.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: A young couple with three children seek Dermots help in revamping their small three bedroomed bungalow in Ballinteer Ailish and Patrick Bates are a young couple running out of space - fast!

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot knows exactly how to solve the problem but it means destroying a lot of the work the couple have already done.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts are up against the clock to revamp their 70s bungalow in Enniskerry before their first baby arrives.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot needs to create "a bungalow downstairs" incorporating a bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, living and dining room.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is normally confident about presenting a plan. But with a couple as design-literate as Greg and Siobhan, the stakes are that bit higher.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Rathcoole with Mary Moore, the design solution Dermot offers Mary is one of the most unusual and interesting he has ever conceived.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Architect Dermot Bannon sets out to transform peoples living spaces. Before moving in to their 1940s ex-council house in Co Kilkenny, the Kirwans added a basic extension.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot wants to turn the house completely on its head, putting the bedrooms to the front and extending the back to include a kitchen, living and dining that leads into the garden.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Templetuohy, Co. Tipperary with Joanne and Sean Cleere who believe they need a substantial extension but Dermot doesnt actually concur.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Room to Improve starts with Margaret and Jodie Burke who plan to renovate the family home in Foxrock.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Pádraig Whooley and Lorraine Dufficey spent 265 thousand euros on their remote cottage at Rossmore in West Cork, they knew that - while the hilltop location was ideal - the house was far from it.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Laytown, co.Meath, with a budget of 60,000 euros, Dermots worry "is even if you took away the shoddy workmanship youd spend the 60k, this is a really difficult one..."

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Dalkey, with a budget of 180,000 euros, he must come up with an innovative design to match their exacting requirements within the confines of an incredibly tight site.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Clontarf, with Denise and Ben who desperately want a second bathroom for their family home, but their budget is limited.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Tullow, with Tom and Lisa who want to renovate their 19th century farmhouse.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Yvonne and John live in a housing estate in Dundalk with their two children. Four years ago, they decided to buy their next-door neighbours house.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Jim and Siobhan Doyle live in a beautiful old house over looking Dublin Bay in Sutton. See Dermot Bannon transform the rambling old house into a beautiful new space.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The series begins in Cork City with our youngest and most ambitious couple yet, Meadhbh and Niall, both 27-years-old.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: After 10 successful years living in Boston, Elaine Mitchell made the decision to come back to the old sod with her earnings.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: No close neighbours, beautiful views of the Wicklow Mountains, a large vegetable patch, 10 hens, four ducks, two geese, four beehives, two dogs and three cats.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Marcus and Margaret are about to extend a two-bed cottage in Dundrum and share it with Marcuss beloved Aunt May.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The number one criteria when buying a house is location and our fifth programme of the series is set in one of the most sought after costal parts of the country, Dalkey.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: John Rochford from Dublin and Lee Benn, originally from Limerick, have bought a house in their dream location - South Dublins seaside suburbia, Blackrock.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot Bannon helps a family to transform their 70s bungalow outside Tipperary into a modern family home.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: This week Dermot goes to Cork to work with a family spanning three generations - who all have different ideas on how to improve their home.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot Bannon tries to turn a dilapidated, woodworm infested 1930s cottage into a starter home for a Finglas family.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: This week Dermot tackles a large Victorian terraced house in the highly sought-after Dublin suburb of Donnybrook.

programme.title: Room to Improve

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Witch
programme.desc: A series of mysterious events lead the people of a settlement to believe that a witch is afoot. A woman will be burned at the stake unless Hawkeye can find the real culprit.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Jesse James Women
programme.desc: Jesse James is involved with four women: a saloon keeper, a banker’s daughter, a singer and a cattle baroness. Their ties, often driven by gain, ignite rivalry and tension.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Cimarron Strip - The Battle Of Bloody Stones
programme.desc: When a young Indian is killed after challenging the accuracy of a battle depicted in a show, Crown must prevent the young mans father, from avenging his sons death upon the star of the show.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: A group of West Point graduates are assigned to the U.S. Cavalry in Kansas during the time of abolitionist John Brown. Stars Ronald Reagan.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Medicine Man
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachgook save an aging Oneida medicine man from certain death and learn about a plot to rob settlers.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Mclintock
programme.desc: Cattle baron George Washington McLintock battles his headstrong wife (Maureen OHara), a ranch hand (Patrick Wayne) who wants to marry his daughter (Stefanie Powers) and evil-doers in this upbeat comedy Western with a memorable ending.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Servant
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachgook find a runaway Irish girl wandering alone in the forest. They learn that she is an indentured servant who was sold into slavery.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: James Barlow (Randolph Scott) is a federal agent who is assigned to bring an end to the reign of terror brought on by a gang of train robbers. Barlow infiltrates the gang and discovers that they have been paying off local officials and finds himself caught in the middle of the good and the bad guys. Based on the exploits of the infamous Reno gang, the first train robbers in American history.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.desc: A gang member misled by his leader kidnaps Dulcey, vowing to release her only if the ruthless Arn Tinker is arrested and hanged. Emotions run high in this gripping episode.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Daniel Boone - Trail Blazer
programme.desc: Legendary frontiersman Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) builds a home in Kentucky’s 18th-century wilderness, defending Boonesborough settlers from Shawnee raids and British attacks.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia
programme.desc: Episode 14 takes place in Estonia where drama and world records will be seen again

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this years competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last years injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.
